name: VOLTRX shaker Bottle, Gallium USB C Rechargeable Electric protein shake Mixer, Cups for protein and Meal Replacement shakes, BPA Free, Made with Tritan, 24oz
description:
Innovative Design All Over

VOLTRX, a magical new way to mix and the ultimate solution to eliminate clumping. New and improved, VOLTRX Gallium electric shaker bottle benefits from patented technology to enhance its power and endurance. The innovative design allows you to clean every corner of the protein mixer cup whilst the tight-fitting screw-on cap ensures it stays watertight. Made with US Tritan material, our electric shaker cup are BPA-Free with an IPX5 waterproof base. VOLTRX is better than ever.

Mix Like A Pro; Stirred Not Shaken

The new patented technologies that built VOLTRX Gallium electric protein shaker bottle provide the ultimate solution to eliminate caking. Traditional shaker bottles with wire mixing balls are hard to clean, noisy and leave lumps of powder in your drink. And all the ballless protein shakers are even worse. Smooth shakes are mixed, not shaken, and the VOLTRX protein shake mixer takes mixing to a whole new level.

Dissolve Within 15s

6000rpm powerful motor with a unique patented blade design and ingenious transmission construction of VOLTRX Gallium electric shaker bottle ensures that protein powder will completely dissolve in liquid within 15 seconds so you can enjoy that silky texture you‚Äôve been waiting for.

Banana Can Be Added

Thanks to VOLTRX Gallium‚Äôs unparalleled power, you can now add soft mashed bananas or your favourite soft fruit puree to your protein drinks to make a delicious flavoured supplement drink.

Seamless Watertight Fit

VOLTRX Gallium protein shake mixer bottle is built to ensure a leak-proof design featuring a reliable screw cap lid and temperature-resistant material to prevent deformation. Keep the electric mixer cup closed at all times, and place it in your gym bag with confidence.

Just The Right Size

The 24oz (700ml) capacity means you can fit 16oz (480ml) of liquid with up to 3 scoops of protein powder, making VOLTRX's Gallium vortex shaker bottle an excellent size for making shakes for anyone. Even if you have big goals, VOLTRX can help you meet them.

There‚Äôs Power In Silence

Clanging ball shakers and loud blenders, step aside. Thanks to VOLTRX's patented silent motor technology, Gallium vortex protein shaker is ideal for use every morning or in the office without disturbing your family or colleagues.

Larger Handle

VOLTRX cares about every design detail which is why you can now carry the Gallium electric protein shake mixer with two fingers, plus the extended handle allows you to hang it wherever you want.

Easy To Maintain

With the IPX5 waterproof base, you can rinse your cup directly under a tap while it's on after use. Gallium self stirring protein shaker waterproof sealing rings are removable, making cleaning every part of the cup easy. It can be washed in the dishwasher after removing the motorized base.

1 Charge For 2 Months

VOLTRX is highly efficient, our designers ensured Gallium rechargeable protein shaker delivers superb power and long-lasting battery life without compromise. Just one charge is required in order to complete two months of mixing.

Designed With The Earth In Mind

VOLTRX Gallium protein shake mixer cup is designed to take care of you and Planet Earth. Our shaker bottles for protein mixes use high quality materials and responsible packaging. Made with Tritan material from the USA, they're more transparent and less fragile for long lasting quality.

VortexBoost 2 VortexBoost 1 Gallium
Stirring power 3 scoops (80g) 3 scoops (80g) 5 scoops (120g)
Battery life 80 times 80 times 120 times
Capacity 24oz (700ml) 24oz (700ml) 24oz (700ml)
Max. water level at mixing 16oz (450ml) 16oz (450ml) 16oz (450ml)
Base glow Yes (colored) Yes (white) No
Material Tritan Tritan Tritan

name: XTK Shaker Bottle Protein Shaker Bottles with Storage and Mix Ball, 16OZ Sports Water Bottle with Pill Organizer,Leak Proof Portable Shaker Bottles for Protein Mixes and Pre Work Out,BPA Free(purple)
description:
Our shaker cup combines multiple functions in one, allowing you to store protein powder and pills. The included metal wire mixer can also smoothly blend your drink, making it very practical and convenient. It is the best choice for sports enthusiasts to supplement nutrition and hydration, and it has the following features:
1. Made of food-grade material, non-toxic and BPA-free.
2. With a capacity of 16OZ, equipped with storage compartments for protein powder and pills.
3. Easy to clean and dishwasher safe.
4. Very portable and suitable for on-the-go use.
5. Available in a variety of rich colors.
6. Worry-free after-sales service.
7.Package includes: 1 shaker bottle, 1 shaker balls, perfect for mixing protein shakes, smoothies, and supplements.
The shaker bottle is designed to be made from premium food grade, high quality BPA-free plastic. Not easily broken, is completely safe to store your drink in protein shaker bottle. Screw caps and safety clamps ensure overall smoothie cup tightness, prevent messy spills, and maximize the cleanliness of your car and bag even when you are in a hurry in the morning. Press the safety flap and hear a click to confirm that the lid is tight, so you can take it outside or exercise with you.
Our shaker bottles for protein mixes feature multiple features such as leak proof seal, wide spout with tight lid, hiking buckle carrying handle.
The gym bottle comes with a coil spring mixer for the protein mix, which mixes the protein shake faster than the stir ball so it doesn't clump when shaken, and the shake ball hits the bottom so there's no more residue on the bottom, stirring more evenly.

Additionally, it is dishwasher safe for easy and effortless cleaning.,„ÄêLeak Proof & Smooth Mixing „ÄëThis protein bottle with a screw-on lid and leak-proof flip cap will keep your bottle shaker securely in place, preventing any liquid from leaking through cracks. name: HELIMIX 2.0 Vortex Blender Shaker Bottle Holds upto 28oz | No Blending Ball or Whisk | USA Made | Portable Pre Workout Whey Protein Drink Shaker Cup | Mixes Cocktails Smoothies Shakes | Top Rack Safe
description:
About this item

üö´ NO SHAKING ACCESSORIES NEEDED - Forget the days of looking for your wire shaker ball and buying shaker ball replacements because the Helimix uses a patented vortex blender design that doesn't require anything but a few good shakes. This also means you don't have to worry about a clogged or dirty shaker balls ruining your protein shake.
üèÜ SUPERIOR SUPPLEMENT MIXING - Helimix has been rigorously tested against other mixer cups to ensure you get the best shaker bottle on the market. Our patented vortex design allows for optimal mixing of any powder supplement.
üëÉ ODOR RESISTANT MATERIAL - Helimix is made with Copolyester Plastic, which makes the cup odor resistant so you don't have to gag down your sports drinks. It's also 100% BPA/BPS-free plastic to ensure supplements stay clean.
üßº DURABLE & EASY TO CLEAN - Helimix uses shatter-proof Copolyester plastic. And once your workout is done, throw the Helimix in your dishwasher for a quick and easy clean. Most other shaker bottles are made of cheap plastic and are breakable.
ü§ù LEAK PROOF GUARANTEE - If it leaks please contact us and we'll make sure you're issues are resolved. We pride ourselves in our quality products and customer service. Also, the patented design of Helimix includes a sturdy loop for easy transport to and from the gym. The Helimix is just the right size that fits in nearly all cup holders.

name: BlenderBottle Classic V2 Shaker Bottle Perfect for Protein Shakes and Pre Workout, 20-Ounce (3-Pack) Red, Green, and Plum
description:
About this item

Pack of three, 20-ounce capacity (note: measurements only go to 14 ounces) classic shaker cup with V2 upgrades, including a rounded base, SpoutGuard, and modern design
Patented mixing system uses 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall wire whisk for mixing protein shakes, smoothies, and supplements
Wide mouth makes it easy to add mix scoops and liquids, and embossed markings measure both ounces and milliliters; rounded base for thorough mixing
Screw-on lid creates leak-proof seal, and secure flip cap with SpoutGuard keeps the mouthpiece clean; wide loop top for easy carrying or attaching keys

name: SHAKESPHERE Tumbler: Protein Shaker Bottle and Smoothie Cup, 24 oz - Bladeless Blender Cup Purees Raw Fruit with No Blending Ball - Drink Powder Mix Shake Mixer for Pre Workout, Gym (Matte Black)
description:
Easy Shake Mixing In a Premium Tumbler

ShakeSphere Tumbler is an ingeniously designed shaker bottle with patented capsule shape. Its innovative shape allows for superior mixing of supplements, vitamins, powders, drinks, fruits, while enabling super-fast cleanup!

All this is enhanced by an easy to clean, highly durable and resistant rugged design. A gorgeous sleek look rounds out the package.

Where impeccable quality mix with flawless practicality

Perfect Blending Ratios

Available with a 24.6 FL OZ capacity, ShakeSphere is the best protein shaker after your workout, lifting session, swimming, running, weightlifting and any other sport. Its unique design also makes it easy to carry around.

Perfect Drinking Control

The finger loop and the slide cap with silicone making carrying and drinking from the ShakeSphere Tumbler a joy. The hemisphere base & lid keep shaker standing when you need it. Excellent for any sport and fitness enthusiast.

Striking Rugged Build

The ShakeSphere Tumbler is food safe, CE certified and BPA free. It is designed to be the most convenient, functional and hygienic shaker bottle on the market.

description:
About this item

3-in-1 Protein Shakers: Designed with a standard shake bottle and two screw-on attachments, including a powder container and sectioned pill container, we‚Äôve made storing proteins, vitamins, and supplements even easier on the go.
Efficient Mixing: Stainless steel shaker for protein shakes use a spiral spring stirrer, which can mix the protein shake cup faster than the stirring ball, so that it will not clump while shaking it will hit the bottom so that there is no more residue on the bottom.
Portable Non-slip and Leak-proof: Our protein mixer bottle is suitable for most car cup holders and bicycle water bottle holders. It is convenient for you to carry around. The cup body has scale marks. In addition, the design of the flip cover is absolutely leak-proof, splash-proof and non-slip, the first choice for fitness outings.
100% Satisfaction Guarantee: If you have any problem with our Sports Fitness Shaker Water Bottle or questions, please kindly contact us for direction, exchange, refund or return.

name: HeaDot Electric Protein Shaker Bottle, Blender Bottles for Protein Mixes, 24 Oz Echargeable Type-C Shaker Cup, Made with Tritan, BPA Free Shakers for Protein Shakes(Orange)
description:
Headot specializes in electric shaker bottle, and we put our customers' health first.Our mission is to provide our customers with the best products and services. We put a high value on customers' using experience and suggestions, so we will keep improving our products to satisfy everybody's need.

Pop-up Bottle Cap

The pop-up cap makes it easier to open the electric blender bottles.Leak-proof snap design provides 100% leak-proof protection for daily carry.

Portable Design

Easy to be portable, the protein shake mixer will become a good companion for your study, work, exercise and travel.

Type-C Charging

Type-C 1.5 hours fast charging, safe and reliable.One charge can be used for more than 30 times, perfect for daily use.

Powerful Motors

The powerful motor provides 6000Rpm/min to stir your drinks with ease.Stir well without lumps

Waterproofing

Headot high quality waterproof ring design will give you unlimited confidence. You can always trust it.Great portable blender.

Easy to Clean

You can remove the base and put the bottle in the dishwasher, or add water to the mixer cup and press the power switch to clean it automatically.

Large Capacity

The adequate capacity and clear scale markings allow you to mix your drinks accurately.

Environmental Advocate

We are ambassadors for the protection of the environment.All materials are high quality and recyclable. We are a responsible company.

features: [USB Rechargeable and Long-lasting Battery] - The shaker bottle is equipped with a high-capacity 600mAh built-in battery, which can be charged anytime through any USB interface. The shake cup can be fully charged in 1.5 hours and can be used for over 30 cycles on a single charge. The long-lasting battery life meets daily needs for work, travel, sports, and more.,[Food-Grade Eco-Friendly Material] - Our shaker cup is made of 100% BPA-free eco-friendly Tritan material. The ergonomic button pop-up lid design has a leak-proof guarantee. We are committed to contributing to the sustainability of the planet.,[High-Speed Efficient Blending] - Two modes, one click of the button can automatically mixing for 30 seconds, double click of the button can automatically mixing for 100 seconds. The high efficiency motor provides powerful power for the blender bottles, with a speed of up to 6,000 rpm, which can easily stir protein powder to ensure smooth mixing and no lumps.,[Easy to Clean] - The HEADOT blender cup uses shatterproof Tritan plastic that is odorless and not easily broken. You can pour warm water and detergent into the mixer cup, turn on the switch and let the mixer cup wash automatically. You can also remove the motor base and put the cup in the dishwasher to clean it. Please do not wash the motor base in the dishwasher.,[Security and Guarantee] - The high-quality motor ensures your safety during use, and the food-grade eco-friendly material allows you to use our protein shaker bottle with confidence. To better use our blender, please follow the instructions provided with our product. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us, and we will provide you with the best support.

name: Wave Shaker Bottle 20oz | No Blender Ball Needed | Great For Pre Workout, Protein Shakes, and Cocktails | BPA Free | Rope Handle
description: The Wave shaker bottle is a premium high quality mixing bottle made from BPA free plastic. The innovative design allows for you to have clump free shakes without the need for a blending ball. This shaker bottle is perfect for not only protein shakes and pre workout, but also for mixing your favorite cocktails. Use the stylish rope on the side to hang your cup on display, or for attaching it to your favorite gym bag. This odor free never before seen shaker cup will change the way that you look at mixing bottles forever! Use it to mix your favorite protein powder, pre workout, or even mixed drinks.

name: BlenderBottle Classic V2 Shaker Bottle Perfect for Protein Shakes and Pre Workout, 20-Ounce, Teal
description: The BlenderBottle Classic V2 Shaker Bottle is built off the design of the iconic BlenderBottle Classic, with an upgraded look, and feature updates‚Äîincluding a rounded base and SpoutGuard‚Äîthat make it easy to maintain proper nutrition on-the-go. The patented mixing system‚Äîwith a 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall wire whisk that moves inside the bottle to smooth out mixes‚Äîmakes it ideal for protein shakes, smoothies, fiber drinks, and meal replacements. A wide mouth makes it easy to add ingredients, and the rounded base ensures thorough mixing and easy cleanup. Bottle contents and liquids are securely contained by a tightly threaded screw-on lid that creates a leakproof seal, and an ergonomic flip cap that snaps securely shut for shaking and transportation (fits in most cupholders). A SpoutGuard makes it possible to open the flip top without touching the drinking spout, to keep the mouthpiece clean. Embossed markings show both ounces and milliliters for easy measuring. The BlenderBottle Classic V2 Shaker Bottle can also be used as a water bottle. Available in three sizes: 20-Ounce (measurements go to 14 ounces), 28-Ounce (measurements go to 22 ounces), and 45-Ounce (measurements go to 34 ounces). BPA- and phthalate-free. Top-rack dishwasher safe. Manufacturer‚Äôs limited lifetime warranty.

name: Utopia Home 2-Pack Shaker Bottle - 24 Ounce Protein Shaker Plastic Bottle for Pre & Post workout with Twist and Lock Protein Box Storage(All Black & Clear/Black)
description:
About this item

SHAKER BOTTLE PACK OF 2 - Includes 2 units of 24-ounce / 700 ml capacity shaker bottle, a detachable protein storage jar, and a plastic whisk mixer ball. The ideal sports bottle for instant protein shakes and supplement drinks.
PROTEIN BOX - The protein mixer bottles come with a twist-and-lock protein box/storage compartment with a 200cc capacity provides for easy storage of protein powder, supplements and more.
EASY TO CARRY - With Strong & firm handle, you can carry the protein blender bottle along wherever you want to; ideal for pre, post and during workouts.
INTERLOCKING FACILITY - The protein storage jars at the bottom come with an interlocking feature, allowing you to use the protein shaker bottle with or without the storage box.
NOT DISHWASHER SAFE -Clean with hands using a light detergent and water

name: Eco Shake, your eco-friendly bottle: shaker bottle for the health-conscious & environmentally friendly. 100% biodegradable Wheat Straw, 20-ounce
description: Our mission at ECO SHAKE is to provide sustainable, high-quality, eco-friendly, and cost-efficient alternatives to single-use and plastic-based items.‚òÖ The ECO SHAKE Classic Shaker Bottle is based on the iconic blender bottle design, but unlike traditional blender bottles, our green cup is composed of biodegradable, recyclable, and sustainable materials. Our protein shaker is a durable and lightweight option for the gym, for the trail, or for everyday life that is environmentally friendly for the health-conscious consumer.‚òÖ ECO SHAKE utilizes food-safe, non-toxic, 100% natural wheat straw that is high in quality and robust in nature. Compared to other protein blender shakers, our bottle contains no heavy metals, is BPA-free and has a bioplastic lining made from plants, not oil or plastic.‚òÖ Friendly for you‚Äîand eco-friendly for the environment, too! The blender ball wire whisk combines ingredients like whey protein, soy protein isolate, fiber drinks, and pumpkin seed protein powder smoothly and consistently without clumping, and you‚Äôll never drop a beat‚Äîor this bottle‚Äîthanks to its ergonomic design.‚òÖ We triple-checked that our lids screw on tight and our caps click shut to verify that the ECO SHAKE was leak-proof. We ran our bio bottle through the dishwasher hundreds of times to ensure that it was durable and did not distort with high heat.‚òÖ We took the ECO SHAKE to the gym, dropped it during hiking, and knocked it off the kitchen counter to test its strength. We are as committed to your happiness and satisfaction as we are to the environment, and we are proud to offer you the ECO SHAKE, your eco-friendly (and super-durable) blender bottle. ‚òÖ Quick directions for use: Use as a blender shaker or remove wire whisk to use as a water bottle. To keep the mouthpiece clean, a spout guard allows you to open the flip-top without touching the drinking spout. ‚òÖ For easy measurement, refer to the markings inside the thermos.

name: VOLTRX Premium Electric Protein Shaker Bottle, Made with Tritan - BPA Free - 24 oz Vortex Portable Mixer Cup/USB Rechargeable Shaker Cups for Protein Shakes
description:
About this item

Premium value for money: VOLTRX VortexBoost mixing bottle is made of Tritan, which is completely safe to infant grade regulations as well as being shatter resistant. No BPA. Use as you please!
Unique and functional eye-catching design: Be the center of attention with the vortex-mixing spectacle! The 24oz (700ml) capacity (note: measurements only go to 20 ounces) makes this the perfect assistant to your workouts to help you achieve the perfect physique.
Insane 1 month of use from a 2-hour charge: Enjoy a year of battery life with just one charge (based on a three times a week usage pattern). Powerful motor ensures no remaining chunks (performance may drop slightly when charge is low).
Easy to clean: - Simply pour in some warm water mixed with detergent, power up the mixer, and voila, all clean! IPX5 certification allows the outer part to be washed.
In the box: VOLTRX VortexBoost rechargeable electric shaker bottle, Micro USB C charging cable, specially designed packaging backed by our worry-free 1 year warranty and world class customer service. Sport shaker bottle for fitness people.

name: Lyeasw 24 OZ Shaker Bottle for Protein Mixes, 2 Pack BPA Free Leakproof Portable Shaker Cups for Workout, Black
description:
Healthy shaker bottle: 2 pack of black shaker bottles are made from BPA-free and food grade stainless steel, ensuring your food safety and compliance with US FDA. They are perfect for mixing all kinds of supplements,smoothies and protein powders without any clumps.
Stylish and Practical: These shaker bottles have a wide mouth screw cap allows you to add mix scoops and liquids easily. The strong handle makes them easy to carry, and the frosted finish gives them a stylish look.
Efficient and Convenient: The embossed markings on the bottle measure both ounces and milliliters, making it easy to measure out the perfect amount of ingredients. 30oz/875ml full capacity markings to 24oz/700ml.
Leak-proof and lock lid design: The screw-on lid creates a leak-proof seal and the fully open twist lock lid won't fall down when you drink.
Versatile bottle: Applicable temperature range is -4 to 248 degrees Fahrenheit,dishwasher safe. If you're at the gym, on a hike, or just need to stay hydrated throughout the day, our shaker bottle is the perfect accessory.

• Healthy shaker bottle: 2 pack of black shaker bottles are made from BPA-free and food grade stainless steel, ensuring your food safety and compliance with US FDA. They are perfect for mixing all kinds of supplements,smoothies and protein powders without any clumps.

  • Efficient and Convenient: The embossed markings on the bottle measure both ounces and milliliters, making it easy to measure out the perfect amount of ingredients. 30oz/875ml full capacity markings to 24oz/700ml.
  • Leak-proof and lock lid design: The screw-on lid creates a leak-proof seal and the fully open twist lock lid won't fall down when you drink.
  • Versatile bottle: Applicable temperature range is -4 to 248 degrees Fahrenheit,dishwasher safe. If you're at the gym, on a hike, or just need to stay hydrated throughout the day, our shaker bottle is the perfect accessory.

name: (2-Pack) 28 Oz Large Shaker Bottles for Protein Mixes, Shaker Bottle with Stainless Steel Wire Whisk Ball, Protein Shaker Bottle, Shaker Cup, Protein Shaker, Protein Shake Bottle, Bottle Shaker
description:
Package includes 2 shaker bottle with a blender ball each, perfect for mixing protein shakes, smoothies, and supplements.
RH shaker bottle is made of high-quality plastic and is BPA- and phthalate-free, featuring a push and screw-on lid with a flip cap to keep the mouthpiece clean of debris for the shake bottle.
Our shaker bottle comes with a sturdy loop top so that you can carry it easily and hook it somewhere for storage.
RH shaker bottle has a 28-ounce capacity, so plenty of space is available to mix your favorite protein drink. This way, you can take your protein shake to the gym and carry it instead of your regular water bottle for better nutrition.
The blender ball with the shaker bottle whips the liquid and cuts through powders, allowing you to make protein shakes on your way to the gym- no need to carry multiple accessories.

name: VOLTRX Protein Shaker Bottle, Merger USB C Rechargeable Electric Protein Shake Mixer, Shaker Cups for Protein Shakes and Meal Replacement Shakes, BPA Free, 24oz
description:
Out with the Old. In with the New Era.

The VOLTRX Merger electric shaker bottle signifies a new era in mixing technology. Its powerful motor and cutting-edge mixing blade make it a game-changer in the world of shaker bottles. Say goodbye to the struggles of traditional manual shaking and experience the convenience and efficiency that VOLTRX blender bottle brings to your daily routine.

Shake Off the Past, Stir into the Future

With VOLTRX Merger protein shake mixer, discover that the secret to a lump-free vortex shaker bottle is stirring, not shaking. Featuring multiple patented technologies, Merger protein shaker cup eliminates clumps for good. Mixing balls only create cleaning problems and unwanted noise, while ball-less shaker designs fall short. Choose the right way to mix ‚Äì VOLTRX mixer cup is the answer.

Blend in a Blink

Experience the power of VOLTRX's patented mixing technology, delivering a clump-free mix in just 15 seconds. Say goodbye to lumps and enjoy the smoothest protein shakes with unrivaled efficiency.

The Confidence to Carry. Leak-proof design.

Enjoy the confidence of a spill-free experience with VOLTRX's patented leak-proof design. The ultimate in liquid security, you can trust that every drop stays where it belongs.

Hush-Hush Mixing: Whisper Quiet Innovation

VOLTRX's whisper-quiet mixing technology brings a new level of peace to your vortex protein shaker routine. Experience the convenience of electric mixing without the noise and disruption of traditional electric shaker cup.

Just the Right Size

Designed with you in mind, the Merger shaker bottles for protein mixes offers a 24oz capacity, perfectly sized for a variety of mixing needs and fitting in most gym bags. Convenience meets practicality.

Effortless Clean-Up

Merger's detachable design and removable silicone seal make cleaning a breeze. Enjoy an easy clean-up process that keeps your blender bottle fresh and ready for use.

Mix More, Worry Less

Say goodbye to frequent charging with the Merger self stirring shaker bottle. Its powerful battery provides up to 120 uses on a single charge, allowing you to mix your shakes for an entire month without worry. The USB-C charging port ensures convenient compatibility with multiple devices.

Premium Materials. Healthier Living.

Your health matters to us. That's why the VOLTRX Merger electric protein shaker bottle is designed with BPA-free materials, ensuring product quality and safety. Mix with confidence, knowing you're making a healthy choice.

Mix Responsibly. Protect the Planet.

VOLTRX electric shaker mixer is dedicated to protecting our planet with sustainable production methods and high quality materials. With VOLTRX shakers for protein shakes, you're not only getting a superior mixing experience but also supporting a brand that prioritizes sustainable production and high quality materials for a greener future.

Your Satisfaction, Our Priority.

At VOLTRX, our customer-centric philosophy ensures a seamless experience, with a 12-month warrant and 7x24 professional customer support. As the choice of over 500,000 satisfied users, we strive to provide you with the best service possible.

What's Inside the Box?

--VOLTRX Merger shakers for protein shakes

--USB Type-C charging cable

--Eco-conscious packaging

--Welcome guide

--12-month warrant

--24/7 professional ser-vice

name: Litex Classic Shaker for Protein Shakes and Pre-Workout, Gym Shaker Bottle, Protein Shaker Bottle-24 oz.(pink)
description:
About this item

„Äê24oz Shaker Bottle BPA Free„ÄëThe Pink Shaker Bottle is made of high quality plastic with a 316 stainless steel spiral ball that moves around the bottle and a pre-workout shaker to smooth out the mixture, the Pink Shaker Bottle becomes ideal for protein shakes, smoothies, fiber drinks and meal replacements.
„ÄêEasy Cleanup Shaker Bottle„ÄëThe wide mouth of the pink protein shaker bottle makes it easy to add ingredients, while the rounded base of the shaker bottle for protein mixtures ensures thorough mixing and easy cleanup. The small protein shaker bottle is made of shatterproof plastic and is safe to put in the dishwasher for easy cleaning after exercise.
„ÄêGym Shaker Bottle is easy to use„ÄëThe shaker cup can be opened without touching the drinking spout with a flip-top lid to keep the mouthpiece clean, the small shaker bottle screw-on lid creates a leak-proof seal, and the protein shaker bottle has an adjustable buckle at the top for easy portability.
„ÄêLeak-proof design shaker„ÄëThe contents and liquid in the protein shake's mixing bottle are securely contained by a tight threaded screw-on lid that creates a leak-proof seal, and the bottle shaker also has an ergonomic flip-top lid that snaps securely shut for shaking and transport (fits most cup holders).
„ÄêService„ÄëOur blender shaker bottle with measuring mark and stainless steel blender ball for pre-workout is perfect for nutrition/protein/juice powder shaking. If you have any questions about our products, please feel free to contact us.

name: Promixx Pro Shaker Bottle | Rechargeable, Powerful for Smooth Protein Shakes | includes Supplement Storage - BPA Free | 20oz Cup (Cool Gray)
description:
About this item

No Shaking. No Lumps. Better Taste ‚Äì performance vortex mixer with patented X-Blade technology for super-smooth protein and supplement shakes (No solids)
Durable, Easy-to-Clean Bottle ‚Äì tough, odorless, BPA/DEHP-free and easy to clean ‚Äì add warm water and detergent, turn on, and let your PROMiXX electric shaker bottle clean itself
Airtight Supplement Storage ‚Äì integrated NUTRiPOD for safely storing protein on-the-go (4.5oz/130mg): includes through-flow lid so you can use your shaker bottle as a water bottle while keeping your supplements dry inside
Powerful Battery ‚Äì the long-lasting rechargeable battery will last many workouts. To recharge: remove base, plug in USB cable (supplied) and wait for the indicator to turn green (fully charge before first use)
Perfect Gift ‚Äì designed after six years of passion and product evolution: jaw-dropping in looks, innovative in functionality ‚Äì and tested, recommended, and prized by athletes the world over. The PROMiXX Pro is the perfect gift with 1-year warranty and industry-leading customer service

name: Promixx Pursuit Shaker Bottle Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle and Blender Cup, 18oz, Coral
description:
Mix & Chill

The Pursuit Stainless Steel Shaker Bottle by PROMiXX has been designed with sustainability, functionality and elegance in mind. The removable agitator means no rattling ball and no mess for a perfect mix. The vacuum-insulated bottle ensures your protein shakes are perfectly chilled!

Previous page

Stylish, Ergonomic and Durable Shaker (18oz/550ml)

High grade stainless-steel bottle that's impact resistant, long lasting, soft to touch & recyclable.

Agitator Designed for Optimal Protein Mixes

Integrated and easily removable agitator for the perfect mix ‚Äì no rattling blender ball, no mess.

Detachable Snap-fit Agitator for Easy Cleaning

Snap-fit agitator and curved cup makes for easy cleaning ‚Äì it‚Äôs also top-rack dishwasher safe.

Flip-cap Sports Lid with Ultra-performance Seals

Sports lid with convenient carry loop, and flip-cap and ergonomic mouthpiece that feels good.

Dual Wall Vacuum Insulated Bottle

Dual wall vacuum-insulated bottle to keep your supplement and protein mixes perfectly chilled.

Next page

1 Stainless Steel Bottle 2 No Rattling Ball! 3 Easy Clean 4 Dynamic Sports Lid 5 Dual Wall Insulation

A Powerful Mix

1 million+ Happy Customers

Global leaders in mixing technology, PROMiXX has sold over a million products. Endorsed by athletes worldwide ‚Äì performance mixing is in our DNA.

Sustainable, Clean Cup

Created from recyclable high grade stainless steel, the Pursuit bottle is odor and stain resistant, and BPA-free ‚Äì so your protein shakes stays clean.

Perfect Mix: No Rattling Ball

Integrated and easily removable agitator for the perfect mix ‚Äì no rattling blender ball, no mess!

Vacuum Insulated Bottle

The Pursuit Stainless Steel shaker has a dual wall vacuum-insulated bottle to keep your protein mixes perfectly chilled.

What's included with

Shaker Bottle Pursuit - Stainless Steel

1 x Stainless Steel, Vacuum Insulated & Impact-resistant Cup

1 x Leakproof Sports Lid with Carry Loop

1 x Soft-edge Domed Snap-fit Agitator

1 x Swing Tag with Instructions

Wash thoroughly before use. For best results add liquid before adding your powder. WARNING ‚Äì DO NOT use hot liquids. Hot or warm liquids may create pressure build-up causing the flip-cap to open and spray contents. Fasten securely before shaking and always open with care. Hand wash only.

Pick & Mix

Coral

Graphite Gray

Midnight Blue

Seagrass Green

Ocean Calm Blue

name: Onkuly 6 Pcs Shaker Balls Replacement Shaker Bottle Ball 2.1 inch Stainless Steel Mixing Balls for Protein Shaker, Drinking Bottle
description:
About this item

Value Package: You will receive 6 pcs individually wrapped shaker balls in 2.1 inch, enough quantity for you to use
No More Clumps: If you hate those powder caking, protein or matcha lumps, then you must try our shaker ball, ensures you enjoy a smoother, lump-free drink
Quality Material: Our protein mixer ball is made of food grade 304 stainless steel, please rest assured to use, durable and rust-free
Easy to Use: Just drop a mixing ball into the bottle and shake it uniformly to dissolve your drink, and simply rinse with water to keep it clean after use
Widely Used: This shaker bottle ball is idea for mixing protein powder, juices, milkshakes, whisky and other drinks, great essentials for gym, home, cafe, or bar

name: Ice Shaker 26 Oz , Stainless Steel Protein Shaker, As Seen on Shark Tank, Reusable, Gym Water Bottle, Black
description:
About this item

Premium Quality: Ice Shaker Bottles are made from premium, kitchen-grade stainess steel that will not absorb odors or stains and are double wall vacuum insulated to prevent condensation from building up on the outside of the bottle, keeping your water ice cold for 30+ hours.
Patented Agitator: Ice Shaker's Shaker Bottles come with a patented, noise-free agitator that twists onto the bottom of the Shaker Lid and ensures a perfectly blended drink every time.
Easy to Use: Ice Shaker's 26oz. Shaker has a tapered design for easy carrying and has a BPA-free, 100% leak-proof pop top lid that is easy to open but stays secure while shaking or drinking. The convenient carry handle built into the lid makes this cup easy to carry when your hands are full. Take your Ice Shaker anywhere you go!
Unique Design: For easy measuring, the 26oz. Shaker Bottle comes with 5oz, 10oz, 15oz, and 20oz. Internal measurement markings that lets you add the perfect amount of protein powder or other liquids to mix up any tasty beverage! Designed to fit in all standard size cup holders, the silicone base of the cup prevents it from chipping, sliding, and makes it less noisy when setting it down.
Other Drinks Ice Shakers Can Be Used For: pre-workout juices, protein powder shakes, BCAAs, coffee, smoothies, cocktails, iced tea, and water! As Seen On Shark Tank: Invested in by Mark Cuban on ABC's Shark Tank and created and used by the Gronkowski Brothers and athletes everywhere.

description:

CAPACITY: 28 ounces (Note: measurement markings only go up to 24 ounces). Perfect size for mixing protein shakes, smoothies and other supplements.

PATENTED DESIGN: No more basic, finally a shaker bottle with some style. Our unique patented design will help you stand out from the crowd

name: BluePeak Protein Shaker Bottle 28 oz with Twist Cap, Strong Loop Top, BPA Free, Dishwasher Safe, Shaker Balls Included - On-The-Go Large Protein Shakers (3 Pack - Green, Blue, Gray)
description:
About this item

TWIST CAP: Ball mixer included in each bottle and the twist cap allows easy handling of the shaker. The great blending effect of our fuel shaker ensures that the last bit of powder shakes and is blended perfectly to the water and makes the protein easy to absorb.
28-OUNCE CAPACITY: BluePeak Protein Blender Bottle has plenty of volume to mix any portion size of your favorite protein drink. The colored bottles have graduation marks for easy measuring. Note: measurement only goes up to 24-Ounces (700 ml)
TAKE IT WHEREVER YOU GO: Sturdy loop top for carrying and securing it anywhere. Fits in most car and gym equipment cups holder. Our portable shaker bottles for protein mixes can be your best choice in the home, office, beach camping, workout, sports, or travel. Comes in a high-quality box, printed in high resolution makes glamorous and ideal gifts for men and women!
CONVENIENT DESIGN: The wide mouth design is perfect to add mix scoops, liquids, ice-cubes and for easy cleaning. Plus, the leak-proof screw lid prevent your drinks from spilling and cover or protect your healthy drink from dust and grime.
DURABLE & SAFE: Top-rack dishwasher safe, Standard Size cup holder, Stain & Odor Resistant, and BPA FREE. No rust or metallic taste! BluePeak Shaker Bottle seals tightly so you don't have to deal with any leaks.

name: Super Hydro Protein Shaker Bottle - 28oz - Eco-Tritan, BPA-Free Shaker Blender Bottles For Protein Mixes with Leak-Proof Technology, Stainless Steel Mixing Balls, Measurement Markers (Midnight Blaze)
description: Elevate your hydration and fitness game with the Super Hydro Shaker Bottle in sleek Midnight Blaze, made from the ultra-durable and completely odorless Eco-Tritan material. Crafted with your health and well-being in mind, it's BPA-free and free from toxic chemicals or harmful additives, ensuring that every sip is safe and pure. This 28oz bottle is designed to make your life easier. It comes equipped with a shaker ball and boasts a rounded base for thorough mixing, guaranteeing smooth, lump-free protein shakes every time. The screw-top lid provides a secure seal, making it easy to add your favorite drinks and ice. But that's not all ‚Äì we've included perfect measurement marks for precise ingredient ratios, making it effortless to follow your favorite recipes. Cleaning up is a breeze with its easy-to-disassemble design, and thanks to the Eco-Tritan material, it remains odorless even after multiple uses. Plus, the convenient carry loop ensures easy transport and adds to its overall functionality. Choose Super Hydro for the perfect blend of style, convenience, and safety, whether you're at the gym or on the move.

name: G Fuel Amustycow Shaker Bottle, Drink Mixer for Pre Workout, Protein Shake, Smoothie Mix, Meal Replacement Shakes, Energy Powder and More, Blender Cup, Portable Safe, BPA Free Plastic - 16 oz
description:
About this item

AMUSTYCOW SHAKER CUP: While you are in timeout, pick up the new G Fuel Musty Shaker Bottle. With this stunning drink shaker featuring amustycow‚Äôs signature logo and eye-catching blue color scheme, you‚Äôll be able to shake up your favorite G Fuel flavor and be back in time to load up the chat.
MIXES WELL: No need to worry about the hassle of cleaning and looking after a shaker ball anymore. The top of our blender cup is designed to do all the work. Simply use the cup to mix your favorite G Fuel energy powder with water, give it a few good shakes, and voila! You have a delicious energy drink that'll help you combat anything.
LEAK-PROOF DESIGN: Say goodbye to messy spills! Our blender bottle features a secure locking lid that ensures a leak-proof seal during vigorous shaking or while on-the-go.
VERSATILE USE: G Fuel's blender bottle shaker can be used to create any beverage of your choosing! The mixing glass holds up to 16 oz of liquid, and can be used to effortlessly blend G Fuel energy powders, or to create smoothies, cocktails, pre workout or post workout protein shakes and more!
SAFE, BPA FREE PLASTIC: Made from high-quality, BPA-free plastic, G Fuel Shaker Bottles are safe and built to withstand daily use.

name: TOOFEEL Shaker Bottles for Protein Mixes 28 oz Stainless Steel Protein Shaker with 2 Mixing Ball, Not Stays Cold/Hot, Visible Window Metal Shaker Cups, Leakproof, BPA Free Bottle Shaker
description:
About this item

„ÄêSAY GOODBYE TO SMELLY PLASTIC BOTTLES„ÄëTraditional plastic shaker bottles easily become smelly and are tough to clean. Toofeel's metal shaker bottles are made from premium, kitchen-grade stainess steel that will not absorb odors or stains, reduce your plastic use and microplastic exposure.
„ÄêINNOVATIVE SHAKER BALLS„ÄëThe package includes 2 shaker balls. The Innovation silicone mixing ball is quiet and efficient, without noise, easy to clean, not easily damaged. The plastic mixing ball is quick and efficient to shake. You can choose which shaker ball to use according to different occasions and needs. 2 shaker balls ensure that all powdered additions are mixed up smoothly without lumps.
„ÄêPREMIUM PROTEIN SHAKER BOTTLE„ÄëTOOFEEL shaker bottle is made of 18/8 food-grade stainless steel and tritan material, which is strong, durable, and unbreakable. Stainless steel protein shaker bottle with 2 mixing ball will ensure that all powdered additions are mixed up smoothly without lumps, perfect for protein shakes, protein drink, pre workout drinks.
„ÄêLEAKPROOF / SHATTERPROOF SHAKER BOTTLE„ÄëToofeel protein shaker bottle features a safe, leak-proof twist-on lid that ensures an airtight seal and no leakage. The lid won't burst open when dropped, no more accidental leaking/spilling leaving a mess and ruining your day. If you find that it leaks during use, please tighten the cap, there may not be tightened to cause leakage.
„ÄêEASY TO USE AND CLEAN„ÄëMaking health visible! Scale engraved on the visible window to adjust the water level as needed, and a wide mouth for easy adding of scoops and liquids. Toofeel's 28 oz shaker bottle has a comfortable rubber strap for easy carrying and has a BPA-free, 100% leak-proof twist-on lid that is easy to open but stays secure while shaking or drinking. ÔºàCleaning instructions: Hand wash, do not put in the dishwasher, it may cause leakage at the visible windowÔºâ.
„ÄêPerfect Gift for Fitness Enthusiasts„ÄëSurprise your friends and loved ones with this perfect gift idea! TOOFEEL stainless steel protein shaker bottle is the first choice gift for fitness enthusiasts on birthdays, christmas, thanksgiving and more. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about the shaker bottle.

name: EYMPEU 2 Pack 24oz Shaker Bottle for Work Out, Dishwasher Safe, BPA & Phthalate free, Leakproof. Solid Screw lid Shaker Bottles for Protein Mixes, Black
description:
About this item

„ÄêHarmless Food Grade Raw Material„Äë: Our 2 pieces 24oz/700ml black shaker bottles with whisk ball are made from BPA & Phthalate free material and food grade stainless steel, Also compliant with US FDA standards to provide you a better food security.
„Äê3D High-efficiency Shape Design„Äë: With better material and craftsmanship, This protein shaker's bottom can be shaped into a 3D round shape which can boost up the shake efficiency and makes it easier to clean as most contents tend to flow to the center of the rounded base instead of hanging out to dry and harden on the edges.
„ÄêFully Open Twist lock lid„Äë: These shaker bottles for protein mixes has a solid twist lock lid design to reduce the chance of breaking or leaking than normal snap lid shaker cups. Also the fully open lid won't fall off to hitting your forehead while you are drinking.
„ÄêNo Logo Simple Solid Design„Äë: No logo, wide mouth, screw cap, with a little frosted clear, our shaker bottles are solid as a barbell Within the sturdy design, the bottle shape fits in most cup holders. The strong handle makes it good to carry on your finger during transport, or attach it to your bag, backpack, etc. with a carabiner accessory.
„ÄêInstruction„Äë: These shake cups suitable for mixing various powder supplements such as Protein powder, Creatine, Pre-workout, Keto, Meal replacements, etc. dishwasher safe, Can be filled with hot and cold liquids, the temperature range is -4 to 248 degrees Fahrenheit.Additionally, If you want to fully fill the bottle to above the last 24oz scale till the very top, please make sure screw the lid an extra bit, or there may have a chance of constantly leaking drops due to the pressureÔºÅ

name: ROCI Stainless Steel Shaker Bottle Blender Protein 750ml/25oz - Motivational Funny Stainless Steel Water Bottle - Pre Workout Protein Mixes (Neon Moon Desert)
description:
About this item

With its innovative design and high-quality construction, our shaker bottle is equipped with a built-in blender ball that effortlessly mixes protein shakes, smoothie mixes, and other protein supplements, ensuring a smooth and clump-free consistency every time. Say goodbye to lumpy shakes and enjoy your favorite protein blends with ease.
We understand the importance of convenience and reliability, which is why our shaker bottle features a leak-proof lid and advanced sealing technology, guaranteeing a spill-free experience. No more worries about accidental leaks or messes in your gym bag or backpack. Simply prepare your protein mixes, securely close the lid, and carry it with confidence wherever you go.
Not only is our shaker bottle functional, but it's also stylish and makes for a fantastic gift choice. Available in various attractive colors, it is suitable for both men and women, making it a versatile gift option for occasions such as birthdays, Christmas, and other special events. Whether you're shopping for your loved ones, mom, dad, or friends, our shaker bottle is a practical and thoughtful gift that they will appreciate.
In addition to its shaker capabilities, our stainless steel bottle serves as a reliable water bottle, allowing you to stay hydrated throughout your day, whether you're at the gym, office, or exploring new destinations during your travels. Its durable construction ensures long-lasting use. ( BPA free ).
Invest in our premium stainless steel shaker bottle and elevate your fitness routine, stay hydrated, and enjoy the convenience of a multi-purpose bottle that combines the functionality of shaker bottles, protein shakers, and water bottles. Experience the difference in quality, design, and performance with our versatile shaker bottle, the ultimate companion for active individuals seeking convenience and functionality in one product.

name: Super Hydro Sport Mixer Bottle [3 PACK] - 30 oz - Eco-Tritan, BPA-Free Sports Water Bottles for In/Outdoor Activities with Leak-Proof Technology, Stainless Steel Mixing Balls, Measurement Markers
description: Introducing the Super Hydro Pack of 3 Colors Sport Mixer Bottles. These premium shaker bottles offer the ultimate combination of style, functionality, and convenience. Designed with your active lifestyle in mind, each bottle in this pack is equipped with advanced features to support your fitness, hydration, and nutritional needs. With our leak-proof technology, you can say goodbye to messy spills and confidently take your shakes on the go. The rounded base ensures optimal mixing, delivering smooth and lump-free beverages every time. Crafted from BPA-free and DEHP-free materials, these bottles prioritize your health while being eco-friendly. They are also odor and stain resistant, maintaining freshness and cleanliness with ease. Each bottle boasts a generous 30 oz capacity, allowing you to stay hydrated and fueled throughout your day. The included stainless steel mixing balls enhance blending, ensuring perfectly mixed protein shakes, smoothies, and nutritional drinks. The Super Hydro Pack of 3 Colors Sport Mixer Bottles are offering a variety of stylish options to suit your personal preference. Whether you're hitting the gym, embarking on outdoor adventures, or simply need a reliable companion for everyday hydration, these bottles are up to the task. Experience the convenience, durability, and style of the Super Hydro Pack of 3 Colors Sport Mixer Bottles and elevate your fitness journey to new heights.

description:
12OZ Pink Leak Proof Shaker Bottle with Loop Hook

Practical and efficient yet alluringly sophisticated. All bottles are meticulously designed with your needs in mind, offering a versatile gym bottle ideal for shakes, water, pre-workout supplements or post-workout nutrition. Begin your pursuit of perfection and discover our full range of shaker bottles and sleek gym accessories for women and men.

Features

100% LEAK-PROOF
TEMPERATURE : -20‚ÑÉ~120‚ÑÉ
DOUBLE MEASUREMENTS
WIDE OPEN MOUTH
LIGHTWEIGHT

Where to use

Bottle is perfect to use in different environments:

Fitness: Energize yourself before workout, hydrate during workout and gain back the water you need after
Travel: Carry your durable bottle everywhere in the world and keep hydrated when temperature changes
Office: Relaxed at the lunch time and keep the bottle as an eye candy
Driving: Energize yourself on the road

About this item

100% LEAK-PROOF: 400Ml Capacity with 100% Leak-proof. It is made of high quality food grade PP material.
TEMPERATURE CHANGES: It can bear from -20 degree to 120 degree.

WIDE OPEN MOUTH: Makes it easy to fill and clean after use. The bottle‚Äôs sturdy construction won‚Äôt break even when dropped or stored. You can easily clean the bottle through hand washing with soapy water.
CONVENIENCE: The water bottle comes with a handle, it is lightweight too. You can take it everywhere you want.

name: BrioBottle ‚Ñ¢ Stainless Steel Shaker Bottle - 24oz Insulated Protein Metal Cup - Reusable Odor Resistant Smoothie Shaker Bottle - Black Water Bottle
description:
About this item

Odor-Free Innovation - Experience unparalleled freshness with our stainless steel shaker bottle! The patented ceramic coating of the BrioShaker ensures no lingering smells, providing a pleasant and odor-free drinking experience for health-conscious individuals.
Effortless Cleaning - Say goodbye to scrubbing battles with our stainless shaker bottle! The stick and stain-proof design makes cleaning a breeze, offering a pristine BrioShaker with minimal effort.
Insulated All-Day Enjoyment - Stay refreshed and revitalized throughout the day with our insulated protein shaker bottle! Enjoy the luxury of icy cold or steaming-hot beverages for up to 24 hours, making the BrioShaker the perfect companion for all-day hydration and energy replenishment.
Generous 24oz Capacity - Stay hydrated and energized effortlessly! Our insulated shaker cup boasts a generous 24oz capacity, providing ample hydration during workouts and beyond. Additionally, it conveniently doubles as a smoothie shaker, ensuring you have the ideal blend for your active lifestyle.
Leak-Proof Assurance - Toss it in your gym bag worry-free! The BrioShaker, designed as a cool shaker bottle with a stainless steel shaker cup, guarantees no accidental protein spills. The secure screw-on drinking cap ensures your valuable drinks stay intact, saving you from messy and frustrating leaks.

name: HELIMIX 2.0 Vortex Blender Shaker Bottle Holds upto 28oz | No Blending Ball or Whisk | USA Made | Portable Pre Workout Whey Protein Drink Shaker Cup | Mixes Cocktails Smoothies Shakes | Top Rack Safe
description:
About this item

üö´ NO SHAKING ACCESSORIES NEEDED - Forget the days of looking for your wire shaker ball and buying shaker ball replacements because the Helimix uses a patented vortex blender design that doesn't require anything but a few good shakes. This also means you don't have to worry about a clogged or dirty shaker balls ruining your protein shake.
üèÜ SUPERIOR SUPPLEMENT MIXING - Helimix has been rigorously tested against other mixer cups to ensure you get the best shaker bottle on the market. Our patented vortex design allows for optimal mixing of any powder supplement.
üëÉ ODOR RESISTANT MATERIAL - Helimix is made with Copolyester Plastic, which makes the cup odor resistant so you don't have to gag down your sports drinks. It's also 100% BPA/BPS-free plastic to ensure supplements stay clean.
üßº DURABLE & EASY TO CLEAN - Helimix uses shatter-proof Copolyester plastic. And once your workout is done, throw the Helimix in your dishwasher for a quick and easy clean. Most other shaker bottles are made of cheap plastic and are breakable.
ü§ù LEAK PROOF GUARANTEE - If it leaks please contact us and we'll make sure you're issues are resolved. We pride ourselves in our quality products and customer service. Also, the patented design of Helimix includes a sturdy loop for easy transport to and from the gym. The Helimix is just the right size that fits in nearly all cup holders.

name: Shaker Bottle 28oz for Gym, Protein Shaker Bottle with Blender Bottle Whisking Ball
description: Introducing the Blender Bottle Classic Shaker Bottle, the ultimate gym companion for all your protein mixing needs. This high-quality bottle is made with durable, BPA-free materials, ensuring you can carry it around with you wherever you go, without worrying about leaks or spills. The Blender Bottle Classic Shaker Bottle is designed with a leak-proof spout cover, which prevents any unwanted drips from escaping, while also ensuring the contents remain fresh. The flip top lid makes it easy to carry around and drink from, whether you're at the gym or on the go. This shaker bottle also comes equipped with a blending ball or whisk, which makes blending protein shakes and pre-workout mixes a breeze. The wire whisk efficiently mixes even the thickest ingredients, ensuring a smooth and consistent blend every time. The Blender Bottle Classic Shaker Bottle has a generous capacity of 28 ounces, making it perfect for all your protein mixing needs. It can also be used as a water bottle and protein shaker, making it a versatile accessory for all your workout needs. Clean-up is a breeze with this dishwasher safe shaker bottle. You can easily pop it in the dishwasher, ensuring that it's ready to go for your next workout session. Invest in the premium SuppCup Shaker Bottle Classic Shaker Bottle today and take your sports nutrition to the next level.

name: Promixx FORM Sports Water Bottle - Premium BPA Free Water Bottle for Fitness Sports & Outdoors - Sustainable Drinks Bottle with Measurement Markers and Leakproof Lid - 26oz
description: Best in class quality, revolutionary design, unbeatable price and performs every time for a healthier lifestyle ‚Äì pioneered by the fitness experts at PROMiXX, FORM is a hybrid water bottle with fruit infuser AND protein shaker bottle all-in-one! Whether you‚Äôre at home, working out, or perfecting your sport of choice, the slim and stylish design means you can use it for any activity, and our all-round sports water bottle fits effortlessly in your hand, bag, or any cup holder. The measuring scale means your can create perfect protein shakes and infusions every time, and the click-in agitator / strainer means they‚Äôll be super smooth. No rattling blender ball / no mess. FORM‚Äôs innovative super-secure cap and thread ensures that it‚Äôs 100% leakproof, and the carry loop makes it easy to carry, especially if your hands are full ‚Äì enjoy spill-free refreshments and re-energise on-the-go! To top this off, FORM is sustainable, safe and built to last a lifetime. Constructed from carbon-neutral Ecozen, FORM is enviro-friendly, durable, odor/stain resistant and 100% BPA-free, which means your drinks stays perfectly clean and fresh. Toxin free! A sports fitness gift to inspire ‚Äì FORM is the ultimate motivational water bottle, making it a perfect gift for friends, family and loved ones. Stay hydrated for a healthy lifestyle with our clear water bottle 26oz ‚Äì perfect for protein shakes, as a fruit infuser water bottle and a drinks bottle for your daily water intake. Drink more water and stay hydrated! Easy to clean, dishwasher safe.
descriptionHtml: Best in class quality, revolutionary design, unbeatable price and performs every time for a healthier lifestyle ‚Äì pioneered by the fitness experts at PROMiXX, FORM is a hybrid water bottle with fruit infuser AND protein shaker bottle all-in-one! Whether you‚Äôre at home, working out, or perfecting your sport of choice, the slim and stylish design means you can use it for any activity, and our all-round sports water bottle fits effortlessly in your hand, bag, or any cup holder. The measuring scale means your can create perfect protein shakes and infusions every time, and the click-in agitator / strainer means they‚Äôll be super smooth. No rattling blender ball / no mess. FORM‚Äôs innovative super-secure cap and thread ensures that it‚Äôs 100% leakproof, and the carry loop makes it easy to carry, especially if your hands are full ‚Äì enjoy spill-free refreshments and re-energise on-the-go! To top this off, FORM is sustainable, safe and built to last a lifetime. Constructed from carbon-neutral Ecozen, FORM is enviro-friendly, durable, odor/stain resistant and 100% BPA-free, which means your drinks stays perfectly clean and fresh. Toxin free! Stay hydrated for a healthy lifestyle with our clear water bottle 26oz ‚Äì perfect for protein shakes, as a fruit infuser water bottle and a drinks bottle for your daily water intake. Drink more water and stay hydrated! Easy to clean, dishwasher safe.

name: Shake Shot - Black/Red- 4oz Mini Shaker Bottle for Pre Workout, Creatine, & Small Scoop Supplements (Not for Protein) Carabiner & Shaker Ball Included
description:
About this item

Shake Shot is a mini shaker bottle with a carabiner clip to easily attach to your gym bag, backpacks, or keys to work as a supplemental container for storage and a shaker cup all in one; no more dry scooping for working out!
Sizing up at 5 inches tall, 1.5 inches wide, and holding 4 fluid ounces, Shake Shot is the smallest drink shaker cup on the market; no more over-sized smelly protein shaker bottles
The Shake Shot shaker bottle is dishwasher safe (upper rack), BPA free and phthalate-free featuring a push and screw on lid with a flip cap to keep the mouthpiece clean of debris for the mini shaker bottle.
Shake Shot is the perfect shaker bottle for any small scoop powder supplements such as creatine powder, BCAAs, regular or stim-free pre-workouts, intra-workouts, post-workouts testosterone boosters, vitamins, and collagens.
Shake Shot is transforming the Gym, Fitness, and Supplement Industry by rethinking the way you carry, mix, and drink pre-workout powders and other small scoop supplements with our revolutionary shaker bottle

name: VECH Protein Shaker Bottles 16 OZ Sports Shaker Bottle with 2 Layer Separate Storange and Pill Tray Leakproof Portable Water Bottle Portable Pre Workout Bottle with Stainless Steel Mixing Ball (Black)
description:
Product Description

VECH protein shakers provide you with portable services!

Our portable shake bottles come in various unique colors to meet your personalized needs. Protein shake water bottles ensure your daily protein intake and keep you motivated to exercise. Our portable water bottle is perfect for protein shakes, milkshakes, pre exercise or drinking water. These shakers are made of high-quality materials and do not contain BPA. They are safe and durable, and are suitable for you to use during fitness or carry when going out!

Colorful water bottles meet your personalized needs!

This protein shake bottle comes in seven colorful colors for you to choose from, meeting your personalized needs and color combinations for different occasions!

PRODUCT INFORMATION

Product Size:

Bottom diameter:7.5cm

Bottle mouth diameter: 8.5cm

Bottle height with lid: 26cm

Material: Food grade material; BPA Free

Product Include:

1 PCS x Shaker bottle

1 PCS x Mixing ball

Perfect protein shaker bottle

This protein powder shaker has a capacity of 20 oz and contains 2 additional independent spaces and 1 pill tray, which can store protein powder and nutrients independently and achieve free separation. Equipped with a stainless steel mixing ball, it is smooth and compact, easy to clean, and can make protein powder easier to mix.

Leakproof design

The protein powder water bottle can be sealed and leakproof by simply buckling the lid, making it easy to operate and fast and convenient.You can immediately brew and shake protein powder in the gym to supplement your needs.

Easy to Carry

The design of the portable handle conforms to ergonomics, providing you with a comfortable grip experience. If your fitness bag has a lock, you can also hang the cup handle on the fitness bag, making it easy for you to carry out.

name: XTKS Shaker Bottle,16oz Protein Shaker Bottles with Mixing Ball, 3 in 1 Leak-proof GYM Shake Cup with Powder Storage & Pill Tray, Ideal for Workout,BPA FreeÔºàRedÔºâ
description:
Why Choose Our XTKS Protein Shaker Bottles ?

Our XTKS protein shaker bottles are meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and safety. We prioritize the use of premium materials that are both durable and BPA-free, ensuring that our shake bottles are completely safe for everyday use. Not only are they reliable, but they also offer practical features such as leak-proof lids and easy-to-read measurement markers. Whether you're hitting the gym, working in the office, or always on the move, XTKS shaker bottles for protein mixes make for the perfect companion to your active lifestyle. Discover the exceptional quality, safety, and practicality of XTKS shaker bottles firsthand!

All-in-One Multifunctional Protein Shake Cup with Attachments

Our shakers for protein shakes is designed with a stainless steel wire whisk ball, a protein powder storage compartment, and a pill organizer, making it a versatile and convenient choice. The stainless steel wire whisk ball ensures smooth mixing and a consistent texture for your shakes or smoothies. The protein powder storage compartment allows you to carry your protein powder separately, ensuring freshness and convenience. The pill organizer feature allows you to conveniently store and carry your daily supplements or medications. Whether you're at the gym, on the go, or at work, our workout shaker bottle with these added features is perfect for your active and health-conscious lifestyle. Stay organized, mix your favorite beverages effortlessly, and take your supplements on time with our protein shake bottle.

Health and Safety

Our GYM shaker bottle is made with safe and healthy materials, so you can use it with peace of mind. It is crafted from BPA-free materials to ensure there are no harmful chemicals. The bottle is also durable, non-toxic, and easy to clean. We prioritize your safety and well-being, so you can confidently enjoy your drinks using our bottle shaker.

Double-scale with ML and OZ

This protein shaker bottle features a dual-scale design, making it convenient for measuring both ounces and milliliters. With this feature, you can easily follow your recipe or track your liquid intake with precision. Whether you're using it for protein shakes, smoothies, or any other beverage, our shaker bottle's double-scale design ensures accurate measurements every time. Stay on top of your fitness goals and enjoy the versatility of our shaker bottle's dual-scale functionality.

Reliable Durability

The durable construction of our shake bottle ensure long-lasting performance. Made from high-quality materials, it is built to withstand the rigors of everyday use and endure countless shake sessions without compromising its leak-proof capabilities. With its sturdy design, you can have peace of mind knowing that your protein powder shaker bottle is a reliable companion, ready to handle whatever adventure comes your way.

What Will You Get ?

A 16oz shaker bottle
A mixing ball
A protein powder storage
A pill tray

Leak-proof Design Shaker Cups for Protein Shakes

Ensures a mess-free experience, giving you the confidence to carry your favorite drinks wherever you go

Say goodbye to annoying spills and leaks! The tightly sealed lid and secure flip-top cap provide an airtight seal, preventing any liquid from escaping, even during vigorous shaking or transportation. Whether you're hitting the gym, going for a run, or commuting to work, you can trust our GYM cups to keep your drinks contained and your belongings safe from unwanted drips.

The Versatile XTKS Protein Shaker Cup: Mixing Beyond Protein Shakes!

This XTKS protein shaker bottle is incredibly versatile and suitable for a wide range of uses. It goes beyond just mixing protein shakes and is an essential tool for anyone looking to conveniently mix and enjoy various beverages. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast, a health-conscious individual, or simply someone who enjoys homemade drinks, the shaker bottle is perfect for you. Its versatility extends to different types of beverages like smoothies, meal replacement shakes, pre-workout drinks, or even water with added supplements or flavorings. It truly is a multipurpose tool that can be utilized in the kitchen, gym, office, or on-the-go. With its practical design and easy-to-use features, the shaker bottle is a handy and adaptable accessory that can cater to a wide variety of needs and preferences.

description:
About this item

„ÄêBest Gift„ÄëÔºöLooking for the perfect gift for someone who loves sports and the great outdoors? name: Fit Life Shaker Bottle Classic 13.5oz/400ml Shaker Bottle for Protein Mixes, Water Bottle & Pre Workout Bottle Blender Mixer Cup, Dishwasher Safe & Leak Proof (Blue)
description:
About this item

Features: Our shaker bottle has a leak-proof lid, making it easy for shakes, smoothies, or water on-the-go. The shaker fits in most cup holders and comes with a rounded, wire blender ball inside that whisks every bit of powder ensuring the smoothest possible shake. The embossed ounce & milliliter markings help you track your goals, simplifying weight loss and staying fit goals.
Design: A classic handheld mixer, sleek and durable shaker bottle cup for mixing protein shakes, smoothies, supplements & cocktails. The wide mouth makes it easy to add ingredients, and a rounded base ensures thorough mixing and easy clean-up.
Quality at affordable price: Our Fit for Life Shaker Bottle Protein Mixer or Reusable Water Cup is designed to fit your goals without hurting your wallet. With an affordable price, you can enjoy the benefits of the classic design with the upgraded PRO features of the top shaker protein bottles in the market.
Fit for life: Our idea was born starting with the traditional screw-on lid bottle by adding a more secure flip cap design to keep your gym bag and car seat dry. With our Fit for Life Shaker Bottle 13.5 Ounces, a snug twist of the lid and the assuring ‚Äúsnap‚Äù of the flip cap means you‚Äôre ready to roll.
Zero odors allowed: Most of the shaker bottles smell terrible if left out for more than an hour. However, our shaker bottle is made from only the highest-quality materials avoiding smells and ensuring an easy cleaning process. It is also dishwasher safe.

name: Military Gift Shop 24 oz Insulated USAF Shaker Bottle with Engraved Air Force Logo ‚Äì 24oz Insulated Water Bottle | Metal Insulated Cup for Protein Mixes, Shakes and Pre Workout
description:
Service Disabled USMC Veteran Owned Small Business

24 oz USAF Shaker Cup or Water Bottle.

What sets this shaker bottle apart is its attention to detail. The U.S. Air Force logo is precision-engraved onto the bottle's surface, a symbol of honor, dedication, and pride. Whether you're at the gym, on a hike, or simply running errands, you'll proudly showcase your commitment to the Air Force.

Designed for those on the move, this shaker bottle boasts a double-walled, vacuum-insulated structure that not only preserves the temperature of your drinks but also prevents any unwanted leaks. Whether you're heading to the gym, the office, or an outdoor adventure, you can rely on this bottle to keep your beverages secure.

LASER ENGRAVED

LASER ENGRAVED - Our stainless steel, spill proof blender cup features a precision-engraved Air Force logo, showcasing your pride and commitment to the Air Force and America. No need for a USAF sticker for this water bottle, the image is laser engraved to stay bold and crisp as Day One

MAKE A STATEMENT

Show your Air Force pride.

Our US Air Force shaker cup features the Air Force logo. And you don‚Äôt think we‚Äôd screen print this artwork, do you? Of course not. The images are laser-etched into the steel to remain forever as bold and crisp as they appeared on Day One.

Matte Black powder coated finish with Air Force logo and Barrier Breakers text laser engraved.
Double walled insulation that eliminates condensation
Durable 18/8 Pro-Grade Stainless Steel construction
BPA-Free and Phthalate-Free
Ideal size for all-day hydration and keeps your favorite beverages cold for up to 24 hours, or your coffee hot for up to 12.

HAND WASH for long lasting black matte finish

Service Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business

SERVICE DISABLED MARINE VET OWNED: With a team of armed service veterans and military spouses so you know you will get top quality and attention to detail. Support other military families with your purchase! Semper Fi!

LEAK-PROOF AND SECURE

The double-walled, vacuum-insulated design not only keeps your drinks cold but also prevents leaks, making it perfect for on-the-go use.

UNIQUE AIR FORCE GIFTS FOR MEN OR WOMEN

Whether your Airman is celebrating Father‚Äôs Day, Veterans Day, a birthday or Christmas, you can be sure to get a smile from even the toughest Air Force Vet with this classic and practical gift. Great USAF retirement or graduation gift.

Why do we do what we do?

We are fiercely supportive of the military and we are always looking for veterans to add to our team. Our goal is to try to hire veterans first. Our team is a family and we love coming to work every day.

When people come to our office they always laugh when they see a little dog sleeping on someone‚Äôs desk.

name: HydroJug Stainless Steel Shaker Cup 24oz - Perfect For Protein Shakes, Pre-Workout Drinks, Iced Coffee - Easy Blending, Vacuum Insulated, Cup Holder Compatible, BPA Free - Keeps Temp For Hours
description:
About this item

24OZ STAINLESS STEEL SHAKER CUP: Our refillable, reusable, 24oz capacity stainless steel shaker cup is perfect for protein shakes, pre-workout drinks, iced coffee, or any beverage you want to take on the go!
TWO LID OPTIONS: Comes with 2 leak-proof lid options - the PRO lid features a flip-top cap and carry loop, while the Tumbler Lid With Straw is perfect for hot beverages and features a silicone rubber seal and smooth straw insertion.
MINDFUL DESIGN: Features triple layer vacuum insulation plus an inner copper layer to keep your drinks cold or hot for hours. It is also cup-holder compatible with a silicone base and BPA free.
SMOOTH BLENDING: The included grate allows for easy, smooth mixing of supplement powders and can also be used to hold down ice and fruit for infused drinks.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Wash before first use. The dual function spout is dishwasher safe, however the glass bottle is hand wash only. Soak overnight or use a soft sponge or brush to clean tough stains. Rinse well after each wash.

name: MIXT Energy Shaker Bottle, 16 oz. Shaker Bottle, BPA Free & Lid Mixing Technology (16 oz, Orange)
description:
About this item

MIX DRINKS: The Orange shaker is perfect for mixing any supplements, powders, or proteins!
16OZ: Sixteen ounces give you plenty of room for hydration! But not too much space to clog up your bag or be hard to drag around. Just the perfect size!
DURABLE: This bottle can take a beating! You push your life and body, make sure your shaker can hold up to it!
NO LEAK BOTTLE: The worst thing your shaker can leak you is with your favorite beverage all over your shirt instead of in your belly. That's why ours fit snug and won't spill!
16OZ: Sixteen ounces give you plenty of room for hydration! But not too much space to clog up your bag or be hard to drag around. Just the perfect size!

name: FANS-ONE Electric Protein Shaker Bottle, 24oz Blender Bottles for Protein Mixes, USB C Rechargeable Shaker Cup, Made with Tritan, BPA Free Shakers for Protein Shakes, Onyx Black
description:
About this item

Lockable Leak Proof Button: With one-click design, the electric protein shaker bottle can be pushed up to lock or pressed to open by one hand, not afraid of accidental touch and shaking, ensuring that your bag will not get wet. Definitely giftable for yourself or any other protein drinkers, good gifts for Thanksgiving, Christmas, Valentine's Day, Birthday, etc
Built-in Fast Charging: The protein shaker bottles use an 800mAh lithium battery, charge for 2 hours can be used continuously for 14 times (use three times a week, you can use it for a month without charging). The subtle and stylish color lights add a touch of sophistication and flair to shake routine, creating a pleasant and eye-catching visual effect. Long press and charge will prompt the battery level, and the lights turn off intelligently when fully charged
Safe & Durable Material: Made of premium Tritan, the electric shaker bottle is 100% BPA free, giving you baby-like care. It is not only safe and shatter resistant, but also resistant to high and low temperatures, with a heat resistance of over 100 ‚ÑÉ. The sleek and innovative diamond pattern appearance makes it a standout accessory in your gym bag
Powerful Protein Mixer: Mixes with just a touch of a button, one press mixes for 30s while double pressing mixes for 100s. Perfect for mixing protein powder and supplements without manual shaking. The powerful mixer ensures a smooth and creamy blend, leaving no clumps or residue behind. Makes taking your pre workouts so much easier. The components are detachable, the blender bottles can be stirred or cleaned with a dishwasher, and the motor can be wiped with a damp towel, saving time and effort
Large Capacity & Portable: The 24 oz capacity of the mixer cup is ideal for protein shakes and smoothies, providing ample space for all ingredients. Detachable motor base and convenient carrying loop design, good for taking to the gym or on-the-go, ensuring you can have protein shake whenever and wherever you need a quick boost of energy. Besides, the mixer with rubber grip at the bottom to keep the cup stable

name: LADDER Sport Insulated Shaker Bottle, 21 oz Stainless Steel Metal Protein Shaker Bottle, Dishwasher Safe
description:
Founded by LeBron James

Ladder is dedicated to creating high-caliber NSF certified supplements

When LeBron and his trainer Mike Mancias couldn't find a supplement brand that offered safety and delivered high-performance results he turned to a team of leading scientists and experts to formulate Ladder.

After consulting with long-time friend Arnold Schwarzenegger, these two legendary athletes championed the need for a line of premium supplements with clean ingredients.

name: Ice Shaker 36 Oz Shaker Bottle, Stainless Steel Water Bottle and Protein Shaker, As Seen on Shark Tank, Reusable Stainless Steel Water Bottle, Gym Water Bottle, Red
description:
About this item

Premium Quality: Ice Shaker bottles are double wall vacuum insulated and sweat proof water bottles that hold ice for 30+ hours. They are made with premium stainless steel that does not absorb odor or stains.
Easy to Use: Ice Shaker bottles have a BPA-free, leak-proof pop top that is easy to open but stays secure while shaking. To mix protein, add the agitator in the bottle to blend with ease.
For All Occasions: Ice Shaker bottles are not just for protein powder or pre workout. Use this shaker bottle for coffee and smoothies or, use the removable agitator to transform the bottle into a cocktail shaker.
Unique Design: The Ice Shaker 36 Oz. bottle has measurement markings so it is easy to fill and a tapered design so it fits in a standard sized cup holder.
Ice Shaker: Bring your Ice Shaker bottle to the gym, office, beach, on road trips, tailgating, sports games, hunting, everywhere! This bottle is part of the official Gronk Ice Shaker product line, built by the Gronkowski Brothers.

‚Ä∫ See more product details

name: FuelUp Sport Water Bottle - Gym Fitness Shaker Bottle with wire Whisk 22 Ounce Leak Proof Shaker with Pill Organizer and Storage for Protein Power, Black Color
description:
Introducing the "FuelUp Sport Water Bottle with Container" ‚Äì Your Ultimate Gym Companion for Hydration and Fueling!

Step up your gym game with the FuelUp Sport Water Bottle with Container.

This water bottle is your all-in-one solution to keep you hydrated and fueled, no matter how intense your training sessions get.

Features:

1. Elevate Your Gym Routine: The FuelUp Sport Water Bottle is designed with gym enthusiasts in mind. With its integrated container, you can conveniently carry your protein powder, energy supplements, or post-workout snacks. It's time to maximize your gains and minimize your hassle!

2. Premium Durability: Built to withstand the rigors of your active lifestyle, the FuelUp Water Bottle is crafted from premium materials for ultimate durability.

3. Prioritize Your Health: Say goodbye to worries about harmful chemicals. The FuelUp Water Bottle is BPA-free, ensuring that your hydration and nutrition remain clean and safe. Sip and refuel without compromising your well-being.

4. Leakproof and Workout-Proof: We get it ‚Äì workouts can be intense. That's why the FuelUp Water Bottle features a leakproof design, allowing you to throw it in your gym bag without a second thought. Focus on your reps, not on spills.

5. Swift Cleanup: Keep your focus on your fitness goals, not on cleaning. The wide mouth and easy-to-clean design of the FuelUp Water Bottle make post-workout cleanup a breeze. Quick and efficient ‚Äì just like your workouts.

6. Ready to Go: The gym doesn't wait, and neither should you. The FuelUp Water Bottle's lightweight design and integrated container make it the perfect gym companion. From pre-workout hydration to post-workout refueling, it's all in one place.
