name: PerfectShaker Ironman Shaker, 28 Ounce
description:
THE PERFORMA PROMISE
At Performa, we stand behind our products. We are so confident that our product quality will be able to stand up to the demands of any consumer that we offer a 100% Limited Lifetime pledge on our entire product portfolio. ‚ÄãWe offer durable, secure and leakproof protein bottles, with our twist lock cap and firm, snap-on covers, never worry about your pre-workout or protein leaking. Our protein shakers are the top-ranked amongst their competitors for strength and durability. We are a company with core values of offering high-quality products and bringing out the best athlete that you can be. We offer a product that is perfectly capable of handling your active, on-the-go lifestyle and with licensed protein shaker bottle, they allow you to express yourself and give people a taste of who you are! We teamed up with the extraordinary superheroes and superstars so that our products can help bring out the extraordinary that lies within you.‚Äã

ACTIONROD TECHNOLOGY

Our Actionrod technology is a patented shaker element scientifically developed using the laws of motion. The sliding actionrod acts as a key element which results in a perfectly blended drink every time.

PERFORMA is PERFORMANCE

Now you can rehydrate and refuel like your favorite hero.
Every Performa PerfectShaker is built to deliver against any demands it will endure.

REPRESENT YOUR FAVORITE

Bring out your inner superhero during your pre, present, and post work out! Our Shakers offer top quality performance and shows off a bit of who you are as well. Every athlete is unique and special in their own way.

MODERN INNOVATION

Innovation is a cornerstone of our organization and performance is our obsession. Performa is relentless in ensuring that every product that is sold exceeds the demands that it will endure. In fact, Performa has an entire department ‚ÄúPerforma Labs‚Äù dedicated to ensuring every product that is released is of the highest caliber

FEATURES

100% Officially Licensed
Light Weight & Portable
Extra Wide Mouth
Screw on lid without rubber seal
Mix, pour, and store all in the same container.

REVOLUTIONARY TECHNOLOGY

PerfectShaker crafts the world's best 100% leak-free shaker bottles and mixing bottles. Mix protein, greens, waffle batter, sauces, gravy or anything! BPA-free and Dishwasher safe!

name: HYDRATE Bottles 17oz Twist-on Lid Blender Shaker Bottle - Insulated Water Bottle, Protein Shaker - Leak-Proof Workout Shaker Cup Mixer Bottle - Black
description:
About this item

A shaker bottle with a twist-on lid is proven to be at least twice as safe as a flip-top lid against spills and leaks. The lid will not pop open when dropped, so you don't have to worry about accidental leaks or spills.
Our blender bottle has a unique, patented twist-on lid that can be used for hot beverages. The interior air pressure can be released through the sides of the twist-on lid as it slowly opens, whereas the flip-top lid cannot withstand the shaking of hot drinks.
The workout shaker bottle has a BPA-free, leak-proof lid that's easy to open but stays secure while shaking. This makes it an ideal choice for those who want to enjoy a healthy shake on the go.
To mix the protein, place the shaker in the mixer bottle for easy mixing. The protein shaker tumbler bottle is designed with a flexible lid that can hold hot or cold drinks. This allows you to easily mix your protein shake without having to remove the lid.
This shaker bottle is perfect for your favorite drinks. The lid has a hole to drink from and a hole to insert a straw or to vent your drinks. The black shaker bottle has measurement markings so it's easy to fill and a tapered design so it fits in a standard-size shaker cup holder.

‚Ä∫ See more product details

name: Ayaat Premium Shaker Bottle - 16oz,500ML, Leak-Proof, BPA-Free - Perfectly Mix Protein Shakes & Smoothies - Your Fitness Companion - Black/Blue
description: Elevate your fitness journey with the Ayaat Premium Shaker Bottle - your ultimate companion for achieving your health and wellness goals. Crafted with precision and designed for performance, this shaker bottle is more than just a convenient hydration solution; it's a statement of your commitment to a healthier lifestyle. Premium Quality for Optimal Performance: Ayaat takes pride in using top-notch materials to create a shaker bottle that stands the test of time. Durable, reliable, and built to endure the demands of your active lifestyle, our Premium Shaker Bottle ensures you stay focused on what matters - reaching your fitness aspirations. Leak-Proof & BPA-Free Design: Messy spills and leaks are a thing of the past with our leak-proof design. Engineered to keep your beverages safely contained during even the most intense workouts, you can carry it in your gym bag or backpack without worry. Plus, the BPA-free construction guarantees that you enjoy your shakes and smoothies with peace of mind, knowing that your health is a top priority. Perfectly Mix Protein Shakes & Smoothies: Achieve silky-smooth blends with each use, thanks to the included mixing ball. No more clumps or uneven textures - just deliciously consistent shakes and smoothies to fuel your body after exercise or on-the-go nutrition. Generous 20oz Capacity: With a generous 20oz capacity, our shaker bottle offers ample space to accommodate your favorite drinks, whether it's protein shakes, smoothies, or other nutritional beverages. Stay hydrated and nourished throughout your day, no matter where your adventures take you. Stylish & Convenient: The Ayaat Premium Shaker Bottle not only delivers on performance but also on style. Its sleek design and eye-catching aesthetics make it a fashion-forward accessory that complements your active lifestyle. And when it's time to clean up, the easy-to-disassemble design ensures hassle-free maintenance. Your Fitness Companion: More than just a shaker bottle, Ayaat becomes your trusted fitness companion. Whether you're hitting the gym, going for a run, or embarking on outdoor activities, this shaker bottle will be right there with you, supporting your journey to becoming the best version of yourself. Elevate your fitness experience with the Ayaat Premium Shaker Bottle. Experience the convenience, reliability, and style that sets our product apart. Add it to your cart now and take a step closer to a healthier, more vibrant you. Embrace the Ayaat lifestyle!

name: CooGoo Protein Powder Shaker Bottle for Pre Work Out,Shakes,Smoothies with BPA free & Whisk Ball,400 ML Shaker Cup (16OZ-400ML-1BTL, Clear Body/Black Top)
description: I bought the CooGoo to mix whey powder with water as a daily protein shake. At first, I was getting some leakage while shaking. But when I made a point of screwing the top on as far as it goes and holding the spout blocker down with my finger while shaking, the leakage stopped. The item is dishwasher safe, though I think it needs to stay on the top rack. The bottle came with a metal spiral thing that, when included in the mixture, makes it blend much better. So for my needs, this bottle does the trick. I rated it 4 stars because if you aren't careful it does leak when shaking and because the bottle feels kind of cheap. But at a practical level, it's perfectly fine.

name: Blender Bottle 2 Pack with Stainless Steel Wire Whisk Ball - Two 20oz Bottles for Protein Shakes and Supplements
description: The BlenderBottle Classic 20-Ounce Shaker Cup makes it easy to maintain proper nutrition and hydration on-the-go. Featuring a patented mixing system‚Äîwith a 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall wire whisk (found only in BlenderBottle brand shaker cups) that moves freely inside the bottle to smooth out drink mixes and meal ingredients‚Äîit‚Äôs ideal for protein shakes, smoothies, fiber drinks, and meal replacements. It‚Äôs also a handy kitchen tool for mixing pancake batter, scrambled eggs, and salad dressings. The wide mouth makes it easy to add scoops of powdered mixes, meal ingredients, and liquids, and embossed markings show both ounces and milliliters for easy measuring anywhere. Bottle contents and liquids are securely contained thanks to a tightly threaded screw-on lid that creates a leakproof seal, and a flip cap that snaps securely shut for shaking and transportation. The convenient loop top makes it easy to carry the bottle and offers a place to attach car keys while at the gym. The BlenderBottle Classic 20-Ounce Shaker Bottle can also be used as a water bottle; the ball can be left inside, as it will never rust, chip, or peel. BPA and phthalate-free, dishwasher safe. Manufacturer‚Äôs limited lifetime warranty.

name: BONMIXC Tritan Copolyester Shaker Bottle for Protein Mixes BPA/BPS/BPF Free Protein Shaker Bottle 800ml Sports Bottle 28oz White
description:
Leakproof Lid
Easy to Clean
Shatter Resistance
Lightweight & Stylish
Eco Friendly & Recyclable
Convenient Carrying Handle & Hook

Capacity : 28 Fluid Ounces / 800 ml
Materials : Tritan Copolyester (body) ; PP (lid & blending ball) ; Silicone (Sealing washer)
Temperature resistance : -10‚ÑÉ ~ 96‚ÑÉ
Recommended water temperature : 0‚ÑÉ ~ 60‚ÑÉ (Protect your oral and esophagus)

Innovative | Advanced | Quality

BPA-free isn't good enough anymore if you're using a plastic bottle. Tritan means free of not only BPA, short for bisphenol A, but also free of other chemicals that mimic the hormone estrogen. BONMIXC sports shaker bottle is made of Tritan, ensures your water or supplements stay clean and safe.

Odor Resistance
BPA/BPS/BPF Free
No Other Bisphenols
Chemical Resistance
Heat Resistance 96‚ÑÉ
Greater Toughness
Dishwasher Safe
Long Use Life

Taking advantage of all the benefits Tritan offers, with a frosted outer-coating for stylish, BONMIXC Shaker Bottle helps you stay refreshed and replenished.

Lighter weight than Stainless
Higher Impact Strength than Glass
Healthier than Any Other Plastics

Unique Handle & Hook

Being carried with your fingertips and hung on your backpack.

Simple & Leakproof Lid

No extra parts, the simple lid is one-click-open and 360¬∞ leakproof effectively.

Sports Bottle & Shaker Bottle

Use it as a sports water bottle, and also a shaker bottle with the blending ball for your supplements of whey protein powder.

WARNING 1

DON'T Shake Up Hot Water Over 60‚ÑÉ

The sharply increased air pressure inside the bottle will pop up the lid and make hot water spray with great force to hurt the user.

WARNING 2

DON'T Boil The Bottle

Constant boiling the bottle will deform and damage it.

name: 700ml Shaker Bottle (Blue)
description: Introducing the 700ml BPA Free Sports Gym Plastic Protein Shaker Bottle, the perfect companion for all your fitness and health needs. This shaker bottle is designed to make your workout routine even more convenient and enjoyable, allowing you to effortlessly mix and carry your favorite protein shakes, smoothies, or other beverages on the go. Constructed from high-quality, durable plastic that is free from harmful BPA (Bisphenol A), this shaker bottle is not only safe for your health, but also built to last. Its 700ml capacity provides ample space for your liquid of choice, making it ideal for use during your gym sessions, sports activities, or outdoor adventures. Featuring a leak-proof flip-top lid and a secure screw-on cap, this shaker bottle ensures that your drinks stay where they belong - inside the bottle. The built-in mixing ball helps to break up clumps and create a smooth, lump-free drink with ease. The ergonomic design of the bottle makes it easy to hold and drink from, even when you're on the move. The clear measurement markings on the bottle allow you to accurately measure your ingredients, making it convenient for portion control or following recipes. The wide mouth design makes it easy to add and clean your ingredients, and the rounded edges inside prevent any residue from accumulating. With its sleek and modern design, this protein shaker bottle is not only functional, but also stylish. It comes in a variety of vibrant colors to suit your personal style and preferences. The durable plastic material is easy to clean, either by hand or in the dishwasher, making maintenance a breeze. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast, an athlete, or simply someone who enjoys a healthy lifestyle, the 700ml BPA Free Sports Gym Plastic Protein Shaker Bottle is a must-have accessory. Stay hydrated, energized, and stylish with this versatile and convenient shaker bottle that helps you reach your fitness goals in a smart and eco-friendly way. Upgrade your workout routine with this reliable and efficient shaker bottle today!

name: Wave Shaker Bottle 20oz | No Blender Ball Needed | Great For Pre Workout, Protein Shakes, and Cocktails | BPA Free | Rope Handle
description: The Wave shaker bottle is a premium high quality mixing bottle made from BPA free plastic. The innovative design allows for you to have clump free shakes without the need for a blending ball. This shaker bottle is perfect for not only protein shakes and pre workout, but also for mixing your favorite cocktails. Use the stylish rope on the side to hang your cup on display, or for attaching it to your favorite gym bag. This odor free never before seen shaker cup will change the way that you look at mixing bottles forever! Use it to mix your favorite protein powder, pre workout, or even mixed drinks.

description:
Headot specializes in electric shaker bottle, and we put our customers' health first.Our mission is to provide our customers with the best products and services. We put a high value on customers' using experience and suggestions, so we will keep improving our products to satisfy everybody's need.

Pop-up Bottle Cap

The pop-up cap makes it easier to open the electric blender bottles.Leak-proof snap design provides 100% leak-proof protection for daily carry.

Portable Design

Type-C Charging

Type-C 1.5 hours fast charging, safe and reliable.One charge can be used for more than 30 times, perfect for daily use.

Powerful Motors

Environmental Advocate

features: [USB Rechargeable and Long-lasting Battery] - The shaker bottle is equipped with a high-capacity 600mAh built-in battery, which can be charged anytime through any USB interface. The shake cup can be fully charged in 1.5 hours and can be used for over 30 cycles on a single charge. The long-lasting battery life meets daily needs for work, travel, sports, and more.,[Food-Grade Eco-Friendly Material] - Our shaker cup is made of 100% BPA-free eco-friendly Tritan material. The ergonomic button pop-up lid design has a leak-proof guarantee. We are committed to contributing to the sustainability of the planet.,[High-Speed Efficient Blending] - Two modes, one click of the button can automatically mixing for 30 seconds, double click of the button can automatically mixing for 100 seconds. The high efficiency motor provides powerful power for the blender bottles, with a speed of up to 6,000 rpm, which can easily stir protein powder to ensure smooth mixing and no lumps.,[Easy to Clean] - The HEADOT blender cup uses shatterproof Tritan plastic that is odorless and not easily broken. You can pour warm water and detergent into the mixer cup, turn on the switch and let the mixer cup wash automatically. You can also remove the motor base and put the cup in the dishwasher to clean it. Please do not wash the motor base in the dishwasher.,[Security and Guarantee] - The high-quality motor ensures your safety during use, and the food-grade eco-friendly material allows you to use our protein shaker bottle with confidence. To better use our blender, please follow the instructions provided with our product. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us, and we will provide you with the best support.

Shaker Bottle for Protein and Supplement Shakes

Shaker Bottle by PROMiXX has been designed with simplicity, functionality and elegance in mind. The enviro-friendly ECOZEN bottle has been created using natural materials based on the extract from plant/vegetable materials. It‚Äôs also durable, odor and stain resistant, and BPA-free, which means your protein stays clean. The perfectly curved contours combined with the lid's integrated carry loop means it fits comfortably and securely in your hand. It‚Äôs also guaranteed leakproof, so no leaks in your gym bag!

The snap-fit agitator locks in place which means no rattling blender ball or mess. The soft-edge domed agitator has been designed to help preserve delicate micronutrients when mixing supplements and protein shakes, so they‚Äôre nutritious as well as super smooth. After you‚Äôre revitalised, the agitator can be removed with ease and the bottle‚Äôs rounded edges make for easy cleaning. You can also clean Shaker Bottle in the dishwasher!

Create the Perfect Mix ‚Äì with the measuring scale (ml/oz) you can add the perfect amount of ingredients into the 24oz/700ml cup for an optimum nutritional mix. Use for protein and supplement shakes, smoothie shakes, meal replacements, fibre drinks, pancake mixture, scrambled eggs, cocktails and more. Or just use as a water bottle: hydration on-the-go!

name: Electric Protein Shaker Bottle - USB Rechargeable Blender Bottles - 24oz Shaker Bottles for Protein Mixes - Blender Bottle - Protein Mixer - Protein Shaker - Shaker - Gadgets for Men - Gym Accessories
description:
The Premium Protein Shaker Bottle

With its powerful 10,000 RPM motor, this shaker bottle effortlessly blends protein powders and other water soluble powders, ensuring smooth, lump-free mixes every time. Its rechargeable battery and convenient USB-C charging offers on-the-go convenience. Enjoy the ultimate blend!

Powerful Motor

Enjoy smooth, lump-free protein shakes in 30 seconds with our powerful 10,000 RPM motor.

Ergonomic Shaker

Get long-lasting performance with our durable and ergonomic shaker, designed for a comfortable grip.

Anti Leak Lid

No spills or mess with our sealed ring design, keeping your protein shake secure and your bag dry.

Introducing the Aquafit Electric Protein Shaker,the ultimate solution for effortless mixing of a wide range of water-soluble powders. From protein powder to creatine, electrolytes to milk powder, BCAA powder to oats and even fiber supplements, this powerful shaker ensures no lumps and faster mixing.

Portability Refined

Experience the ultimate convenience of the Aquafit Electric Protein Shaker, designed to perfectly suit the needs of busy individuals on-the-go. With its hoop handle and travel-friendly design, this shaker allows you to effortlessly prepare your protein shakes anytime, anywhere.

Easy to Clean

To clean the shaker, disassemble the lid and wash it with soap and warm water. Or for easy cleaning, add washing liquid & press button on to spin with the lid closed. Do not submerge the base of the shaker in water or put it in the dishwasher. Use a damp cloth to wipe the base clean.

To clean the shaker, disassemble the lid and wash it with soap and warm water. Or for easy cleaning, add washing liquid & press button on to spin with the lid closed. Do not submerge the base of the shaker in water or put it in the dishwasher. Use a damp cloth to wipe the base clean.

description:
About this item

12oz Capacity: The measurement value is shown up to 12oz/400ml, and up to 20oz/600ml if filled with water. Shaker bottles cup for mixing protein shakes,smoothies and supplements.

description:
Headot specializes in electric shaker bottle, and we put our customers' health first.Our mission is to provide our customers with the best products and services. We put a high value on customers' using experience and suggestions, so we will keep improving our products to satisfy everybody's need.

Pop-up Bottle Cap

Portable Design

Easy to be portable, the protein shake mixer will become a good companion for your study, work, exercise and travel.

Type-C Charging

Powerful Motors

To better use our blender, please follow the instructions provided with our product. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us, and we will provide you with the best support.

name: Eco Shake, your eco-friendly bottle: shaker bottle for the health-conscious & environmentally friendly. 100% biodegradable Wheat Straw, 20-ounce
description: Our mission at ECO SHAKE is to provide sustainable, high-quality, eco-friendly, and cost-efficient alternatives to single-use and plastic-based items.‚òÖ The ECO SHAKE Classic Shaker Bottle is based on the iconic blender bottle design, but unlike traditional blender bottles, our green cup is composed of biodegradable, recyclable, and sustainable materials. Our protein shaker is a durable and lightweight option for the gym, for the trail, or for everyday life that is environmentally friendly for the health-conscious consumer.‚òÖ ECO SHAKE utilizes food-safe, non-toxic, 100% natural wheat straw that is high in quality and robust in nature. Compared to other protein blender shakers, our bottle contains no heavy metals, is BPA-free and has a bioplastic lining made from plants, not oil or plastic.‚òÖ Friendly for you‚Äîand eco-friendly for the environment, too! The blender ball wire whisk combines ingredients like whey protein, soy protein isolate, fiber drinks, and pumpkin seed protein powder smoothly and consistently without clumping, and you‚Äôll never drop a beat‚Äîor this bottle‚Äîthanks to its ergonomic design.‚òÖ We triple-checked that our lids screw on tight and our caps click shut to verify that the ECO SHAKE was leak-proof. We ran our bio bottle through the dishwasher hundreds of times to ensure that it was durable and did not distort with high heat.‚òÖ We took the ECO SHAKE to the gym, dropped it during hiking, and knocked it off the kitchen counter to test its strength. We are as committed to your happiness and satisfaction as we are to the environment, and we are proud to offer you the ECO SHAKE, your eco-friendly (and super-durable) blender bottle. ‚òÖ Quick directions for use: Use as a blender shaker or remove wire whisk to use as a water bottle. To keep the mouthpiece clean, a spout guard allows you to open the flip-top without touching the drinking spout. ‚òÖ For easy measurement, refer to the markings inside the thermos.

name: HELIMIX 2.0 Vortex Blender Shaker Bottle Holds upto 28oz | No Blending Ball or Whisk | USA Made | Portable Pre Workout Whey Protein Drink Shaker Cup | Mixes Cocktails Smoothies Shakes | Top Rack Safe
description:
About this item

üö´ NO SHAKING ACCESSORIES NEEDED - Forget the days of looking for your wire shaker ball and buying shaker ball replacements because the Helimix uses a patented vortex blender design that doesn't require anything but a few good shakes. This also means you don't have to worry about a clogged or dirty shaker balls ruining your protein shake.
üèÜ SUPERIOR SUPPLEMENT MIXING - Helimix has been rigorously tested against other mixer cups to ensure you get the best shaker bottle on the market. Our patented vortex design allows for optimal mixing of any powder supplement.
üëÉ ODOR RESISTANT MATERIAL - Helimix is made with Copolyester Plastic, which makes the cup odor resistant so you don't have to gag down your sports drinks. It's also 100% BPA/BPS-free plastic to ensure supplements stay clean.
üßº DURABLE & EASY TO CLEAN - Helimix uses shatter-proof Copolyester plastic. And once your workout is done, throw the Helimix in your dishwasher for a quick and easy clean. Most other shaker bottles are made of cheap plastic and are breakable.
ü§ù LEAK PROOF GUARANTEE - If it leaks please contact us and we'll make sure you're issues are resolved. We pride ourselves in our quality products and customer service. Also, the patented design of Helimix includes a sturdy loop for easy transport to and from the gym. The Helimix is just the right size that fits in nearly all cup holders.

Our bottles are presented in 6 beautiful different colors. The cup body has scale marks. name: Portable Electric Stirring Cup,Portable Protein Shaker Bottle,Portable Blender Bottles for Flawless Protein Shaker,380ML Mixing Bottle Electric
description:
About this item

On-The-Move Convenience: Our Portable Electric Stirring Cup is your perfect companion for mixing powder-based drinks. Forget hand-shaking or stirring with a spoon, the power of a dry battery is all you need for a perfect mix!
Compact & Travel-Friendly: This shaker cup stands at 170mm tall, with a diameter of 68mm. Though its maximum capacity is 380ML, we recommend adding only 200ML of water for an optimal blend.
Speedy Mixing: Powered by a 7000RPM motor, this electric stirring cup provides a seamless mix in just 10 seconds! Now, you can enjoy a lump-free drink in no time.
Long-Lasting Power: It utilizes 2 AAA batteries that offer a continuous stirring time of 30 minutes, ensuring your drink is always mixed to perfection. (Please note, batteries are not included and need to be purchased separately.)
Versatility: Ideal for protein shakes, this electric stirring cup can also be used for a variety of powder-based drinks. Enjoy a smooth blend, whenever you want!

description: Introducing the Super Hydro Pack of 3 Colors Sport Mixer Bottles. These premium shaker bottles offer the ultimate combination of style, functionality, and convenience. Designed with your active lifestyle in mind, each bottle in this pack is equipped with advanced features to support your fitness, hydration, and nutritional needs. The included stainless steel mixing balls enhance blending, ensuring perfectly mixed protein shakes, smoothies, and nutritional drinks. The Super Hydro Pack of 3 Colors Sport Mixer Bottles are offering a variety of stylish options to suit your personal preference. Whether you're hitting the gym, embarking on outdoor adventures, or simply need a reliable companion for everyday hydration, these bottles are up to the task. Experience the convenience, durability, and style of the Super Hydro Pack of 3 Colors Sport Mixer Bottles and elevate your fitness journey to new heights.

name: AlronFitnesss Custom Plastic Protein Shaker Bottle 500ml - Premium Sports Gym Shaker with Leak-Proof Flip Cap & Mixing Ball (Red)
description:
About this item

Smarter & Easier Solution: Introducing the 3-in-1 Protein Shaker Bottles - your ultimate gym companion to seamlessly manage your fitness routine. No more hassle with mixing drinks, carrying extra protein powder, or multiple supplement capsules separately. Stay organized and mess-free with this all-in-one shaker bottle.
Convenient 16oz Capacity: Perfectly designed for mixing protein shakes, this 16oz shaker allows you to add 6-8oz of water, enabling you to blend two large scoops comfortably. Enjoy the ideal consistency of your protein shake without any clumps or lumps, thanks to the built-in wire grids that ensure a smooth mixture.
Leak-Proof Lid & Space-Saving Design: Shake vigorously without worries - the screw-on lid and leak-proof flip cap keep your drinks securely contained. With a dedicated tray for supplements, this shaker bottle cleverly stores pills and powder in the same jar, saving space and ensuring everything is within reach when needed.
Durable & Dishwasher Safe: Crafted with quality in mind, this shaker bottle is built to last. Its sturdy construction can withstand daily use, and the eco-friendly materials ensure both safety and longevity. Plus, it's dishwasher safe, making cleaning a breeze after each us
Convenient Compartments: Our protein shaker is designed for versatility. It features three extra compartments, along with measurement markings up to 16oz, allowing you to carry additional protein powder, vitamins, or other supplements. This all-in-one shake bottle is perfect for post-workout and pre-workout nutrition needs.

name: ROCI Shaker Bottle Blender Protein 750ml/25oz - Motivational Funny Stainless Steel Water Bottle - Pre Workout Protein Shaker Bottle for Protein Mixes (Lifting Club)
description:
About this item

100% Stainless Steel
With its innovative design and high-quality construction, our shaker bottle is equipped with a built-in blender ball that effortlessly mixes protein shakes, smoothie mixes, and other protein supplements, ensuring a smooth and clump-free consistency every time. Say goodbye to lumpy shakes and enjoy your favorite protein blends with ease.
We understand the importance of convenience and reliability, which is why our shaker bottle features a leak-proof lid and advanced sealing technology, guaranteeing a spill-free experience. No more worries about accidental leaks or messes in your gym bag or backpack. Simply prepare your protein mixes, securely close the lid, and carry it with confidence wherever you go.
Not only is our shaker bottle functional, but it's also stylish and makes for a fantastic gift choice. Available in various attractive colors, it is suitable for both men and women, making it a versatile gift option for occasions such as birthdays, Christmas, and other special events. Whether you're shopping for your loved ones, mom, dad, or friends, our shaker bottle is a practical and thoughtful gift that they will appreciate.
In addition to its shaker capabilities, our stainless steel bottle serves as a reliable water bottle, allowing you to stay hydrated throughout your day, whether you're at the gym, office, or exploring new destinations during your travels. Its durable construction ensures long-lasting use, while the stainless steel material maintains the temperature of your beverages, keeping them cold or hot for extended periods. ( BPA free ).
Invest in our premium stainless steel shaker bottle and elevate your fitness routine, stay hydrated, and enjoy the convenience of a multi-purpose bottle that combines the functionality of shaker bottles, protein shakers, and water bottles. Experience the difference in quality, design, and performance with our versatile shaker bottle, the ultimate companion for active individuals seeking convenience and functionality in one product.

name: mountop Electric Protein Shaker Bottle, 18oz Rechargeable Blender Bottles, BPA-free Shaker Cups for Protein Shakes, Portable Drink Mixer Gym Accessories Pre Workout Bottles for Men/women, Pink
description:
About this item

SUPER-POWERED SHAKE BOTTLE - The mountop shakers for protein shakes is fitted with a more powerful motor drive, with a speed of up to 7,850 rpm and a constant voltage design, you don't have to worry about low power causing the speed to drop. Unlike the weaker electric mixer cups, our shaker bottle makes light work of mixing thicker powders and more concentrated protein supplements. Free your hands and say goodbye to clumping.
EASY TO USE & PORTABLE SHAKER BOTTLES - Press the button with the high-speed motor to fully dissolve the protein powder in the liquid, and wait for 30 seconds to enjoy a silky smooth protein shake. The newly developed 18oz protein shaker bottle is designed to meet the daily needs of fitness fanatics, making it the first choice for making your first pre-workout drink, and the blender bottle is easy to carry and takes up only a little space in your backpack.
PREMIUM TRITAN MATERIAL & EASY TO CLEAN - The Electric protein mixer bottle is made of Eastman Tritan material which is heat resistant , BPA-free & durable, to ensure the safety of your protein shake. To clean the protein blender cup, simply add detergent or water to blender bottle and turn on the stirring function to clean cup. The lid of the protein blender bottle is qualified with IPX5, which means it can be cleaned by normal water flow, but should not be immersed in water for long time.
USB-C RECHARGEABLE PRE WORKOUT BOTTLE - The mountop electric mixer cup uses usb-c charging and is installed with a waterproof charging port, so you do not need to worry about water affecting the charging. The battery capacity is 600mah, it only takes 2 hours to fully charge, and you can use it for 2 months (based on the frequency of use 3 times a week). If you work out regularly and need to mix up some supplements, then this long-lasting blender cup will be perfect for you!
BEST SHAKERS FOR PROTEIN SHAKES FOR MEN/WOMEN - Whether you work out at home or at the gym, whether you or your friends like to exercise, you and your friends need an easy-to-operate, long-lasting and mixes finely blended mixing cup, the mountop electric shaker bottle is your perfect choice. Also great for Thanksgiving, Easter, Christmas, and other holiday gifts! For any reason, if this protein shaker bottle does not meet your expectations, free return within 30 days.

name: Fit Life Blender Shaker Bottle Classic 13.5oz/400ml Small Shaker Cup for Protein Mixes & Water Bottle for Shakes & Smoothies with Wire Whisk (Yellow)
description:
About this item

Features: Our shaker bottle has a leak-proof lid, making it easy for shakes, smoothies, or water on-the-go. The shaker fits in most cup holders and comes with a rounded, wire blender ball inside that whisks every bit of powder ensuring the smoothest possible shake. The embossed ounce & milliliter markings help you track your goals, simplifying weight loss and staying fit goals.
Design: A classic handheld mixer, sleek and durable shaker bottle cup for mixing protein shakes, smoothies, supplements & cocktails. The wide mouth makes it easy to add ingredients, and a rounded base ensures thorough mixing and easy clean-up.
Quality at affordable price: Our Fit for Life Shaker Bottle Protein Mixer or Reusable Water Cup is designed to fit your goals without hurting your wallet. With an affordable price, you can enjoy the benefits of the classic design with the upgraded PRO features of the top shaker protein bottles in the market.
Fit for life: Our idea was born starting with the traditional screw-on lid bottle by adding a more secure flip cap design to keep your gym bag and car seat dry. With our Fit for Life Shaker Bottle 13.5 Ounces, a snug twist of the lid and the assuring ‚Äúsnap‚Äù of the flip cap means you‚Äôre ready to roll.
Zero odors allowed: Most of the shaker bottles smell terrible if left out for more than an hour. However, our shaker bottle is made from only the highest-quality materials avoiding smells and ensuring an easy cleaning process. It is also dishwasher safe.

name: Blender Bottle x Forza Sports Classic 28 oz. Shaker - Dino Sore - Black/Orange
description: Whether you're weight training for sports, competing for the gold at the Olympics, or simply aiming to lose weight and stay fit, Blender Bottle's premium and innovative products help you maintain proper nutrition and hydration every step of the way. With the Blender Bottle x Forza Sports Classic 28 oz. Shaker with Loop Top, you can mix up the toughest protein and meal replacement powders. Add a banana or mix in a little ice cream. Whatever you are craving, BlenderBottle has you covered. The patented mixing system uses the BlenderBall wire whisk. Features a "StayOpen" flip cap and the classic screw-on lid. This shaker bottle is 100% leakproof. The adjustable carry loop lets you hold more when your hands are full and provides a convenient place to attach your keys while at the gym. Made from the highest quality materials and is BPA and Phthalate free. Easy to clean and dishwasher safe. Embossed ounce and milliliter markings helps you keep track of your intake. Get the best selling shaker bottle on the market. Holds 28 ounces not including the BlenderBall and powders/supplements. Why the Whisk Ball? Unlike stationary mesh grates or other in-lid elements, the BlenderBall whips around inside the bottle as you shake. The BlenderBall is springy and bounces off both the top and the bottom of the bottle, working against the liquids. Made from electropolished, 316 grade stainless steel, the same material used in surgical instruments and implants. Add ingredients like peanut butter, applesauce or yogurt to your protein or meal-replacement shakes for added flavor - the BlenderBall whips them in with ease. The BlenderBall will never rust, chip or peel. Every BlenderBall is manufactured using a unique multistage process designed to ensure safety, quality, and longevity.

name: BlenderBottle Marvel Strada Shaker Cup Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Wire Whisk, 24-Ounce, Captain America Shield
description: Emblazoned with officially-licensed Marvel logos, authentic BlenderBottle shaker cups get a superhero makeover! Marvel's Black Widow is represented with logos on 24-Ounce BlenderBottle Strada Stainless Steel Shaker Bottles. The BlenderBottle Strada Stainless Steel Shaker Bottle with Locking Lid features an easy-open/easy-close push-button flip cap with a sliding lock to prevent accidental opening. At 24-ounces (interior measurement markings to 20 ounces), the insulated bottle has plenty of room to mix protein powders, supplements, or meal replacement smoothies, using the BlenderBall Whisk, which delivers smooth shakes in seconds without batteries, cords, or hassle. It can also be used as an insulated water bottle. Screw-on lid is leakproof, and the wide mouth accommodates oversized scoops and makes for easy cleanup; a rounded base ensures thorough mixing. Double-wall vacuum insulation keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours. A flexible, ergonomic carry loop provides a comfortable hold, and a place to attach keys or hook the bottle to a gym bag. The BlenderBottle Strada is made from high-quality, BPA and phthalate-free materials. Lid is dishwasher safe; hand wash cup. Not for use with hot liquids. Manufacturer‚Äôs limited lifetime warranty.

name: Ice Shaker 36 Oz Shaker Bottle, Stainless Steel Water Bottle and Protein Shaker, As Seen on Shark Tank, Reusable Stainless Steel Water Bottle, Gym Water Bottle, Red
description:
About this item

Premium Quality: Ice Shaker bottles are double wall vacuum insulated and sweat proof water bottles that hold ice for 30+ hours. They are made with premium stainless steel that does not absorb odor or stains.
Easy to Use: Ice Shaker bottles have a BPA-free, leak-proof pop top that is easy to open but stays secure while shaking. To mix protein, add the agitator in the bottle to blend with ease.
For All Occasions: Ice Shaker bottles are not just for protein powder or pre workout. Use this shaker bottle for coffee and smoothies or, use the removable agitator to transform the bottle into a cocktail shaker.
Unique Design: The Ice Shaker 36 Oz. bottle has measurement markings so it is easy to fill and a tapered design so it fits in a standard sized cup holder.
Ice Shaker: Bring your Ice Shaker bottle to the gym, office, beach, on road trips, tailgating, sports games, hunting, everywhere! This bottle is part of the official Gronk Ice Shaker product line, built by the Gronkowski Brothers.

name: BIONY Electric Shaker Bottle - Automatic Protein Shaker Bottle For Shakes, Smoothie, Meal Replacement Drink - Zero-BPA, Leakproof, Rechargeable, Portable Shaker Cup with Measurement Marks - 24 oz
description:
About this item

Smooth Drinks In Seconds - Housing a robust motor with a 7000 RPM spin speed, this self-stirring drink shaker quickly eliminates clumps of undissolved powder in your protein shake or pre-workout drink.
Simple Operation - No need to vigorously shake your protein shake blender just to get a well-blended beverage. Just press the button on the base to mix your drink to the perfect, smooth consistency.
Safety Comes First - Our gym bottle contains no BPAs that may affect the taste or odor of your sports drinks. The self-stirring jug's lid also creates a leakproof seal over the portable water bottle.
Easy To Care For - Washing this automatic shaker cup is as easy as can be. Aside from the bottle's base, you may safely place all of the mixer cup's components in the dishwasher for a thorough cleaning.
Made For Your Convenience - Our mixer bottle is powered by a 750mAh rechargeable lithium battery. When fully charged (around three hours), the battery can yield an operation time of 40 to 50 minutes.

name: FuelUp Sport Water Bottle - Gym Fitness Shaker Bottle with wire Whisk 22 Ounce Leak Proof Shaker with Pill Organizer and Storage for Protein Power, Black Color
description:
Introducing the "FuelUp Sport Water Bottle with Container" ‚Äì Your Ultimate Gym Companion for Hydration and Fueling!

Step up your gym game with the FuelUp Sport Water Bottle with Container.

This water bottle is your all-in-one solution to keep you hydrated and fueled, no matter how intense your training sessions get.

Features:

1. Elevate Your Gym Routine: The FuelUp Sport Water Bottle is designed with gym enthusiasts in mind. With its integrated container, you can conveniently carry your protein powder, energy supplements, or post-workout snacks. It's time to maximize your gains and minimize your hassle!

2. Premium Durability: Built to withstand the rigors of your active lifestyle, the FuelUp Water Bottle is crafted from premium materials for ultimate durability.

3. Prioritize Your Health: Say goodbye to worries about harmful chemicals. The FuelUp Water Bottle is BPA-free, ensuring that your hydration and nutrition remain clean and safe. Sip and refuel without compromising your well-being.

4. Leakproof and Workout-Proof: We get it ‚Äì workouts can be intense. That's why the FuelUp Water Bottle features a leakproof design, allowing you to throw it in your gym bag without a second thought. Focus on your reps, not on spills.

5. Swift Cleanup: Keep your focus on your fitness goals, not on cleaning. The wide mouth and easy-to-clean design of the FuelUp Water Bottle make post-workout cleanup a breeze. Quick and efficient ‚Äì just like your workouts.

6. Ready to Go: The gym doesn't wait, and neither should you. The FuelUp Water Bottle's lightweight design and integrated container make it the perfect gym companion. From pre-workout hydration to post-workout refueling, it's all in one place.

name: BluePeak Protein Shaker Bottle 28 oz with Twist Cap, Strong Loop Top, BPA Free, Dishwasher Safe, Shaker Balls Included - On-The-Go Large Protein Shakers (3 Pack - Green, Blue, Gray)
description:
About this item

TWIST CAP: Ball mixer included in each bottle and the twist cap allows easy handling of the shaker. The great blending effect of our fuel shaker ensures that the last bit of powder shakes and is blended perfectly to the water and makes the protein easy to absorb.
28-OUNCE CAPACITY: BluePeak Protein Blender Bottle has plenty of volume to mix any portion size of your favorite protein drink. The colored bottles have graduation marks for easy measuring. Note: measurement only goes up to 24-Ounces (700 ml)
TAKE IT WHEREVER YOU GO: Sturdy loop top for carrying and securing it anywhere. Fits in most car and gym equipment cups holder. Our portable shaker bottles for protein mixes can be your best choice in the home, office, beach camping, workout, sports, or travel. Comes in a high-quality box, printed in high resolution makes glamorous and ideal gifts for men and women!

DURABLE & SAFE: Top-rack dishwasher safe, Standard Size cup holder, Stain & Odor Resistant, and BPA FREE. No rust or metallic taste! BluePeak Shaker Bottle seals tightly so you don't have to deal with any leaks.

name: BioSteel Shaker Cup with Wire Whisk Blender Ball, Leak-Proof Design, BPA-Free Plastic, 24 Ounce
description: At BioSteel, we discovered that top athletes were using products with fillers, artificial sweeteners and flavors, mystery ingredients, and stimulants like sugar and caffeine before and after games and practices. This led us to develop a new standard of quality for sports nutrition. Along with our extensive line of nutritional supplements, we wanted to provide you with a way to enjoy your favorite products on-the-go. Our Shaker Cup with Wire Whisk Blender Ball lets you enjoy a perfectly blended sports drink, protein shake, meal replacement, or smoothie no matter where you are. This means you can go from the office to the gym and not waste any of your valuable time to go home and make your daily drink. Just add your custom ingredients and vigorously shake when you're ready to enjoy, whether it‚Äôs a lighter mid-morning pick-me-up or a post workout protein-packed meal. Find out why so many professional athletes choose BioSteel products to support their nutritional needs and start mixing your drinks just like they do. Premium ingredients, product transparency, functionality, and authenticity‚Äîthese values have helped BioSteel redefine and raise the bar for sports nutrition everywhere. And that‚Äôs what brought us here in the first place.

name: Protein Shaker Bottles - 2 Pack of Matching Mixer Cups with Whisk Balls - Portable Leak-Proof Bottle with Carrying Loop - Best for Gym, Workouts, Sports - Dishwasher Safe (Swole Mates, 28oz)
description:
About this item

PERFORMANCE DESIGN: Portable and ultra-durable, our protein shakers feature a leak-proof screw top, easy flip cap spout, whisk ball, carrying loop, and everything you need to take your drinks on the go! Get blender cups made to keep up with your workout!

  • EASY TO USE, EASY TO CLEAN: BRIMZ shaker bottles 28 oz and have measurements for up to 20 ounces. They're great for protein shakes or water. Our cups are dishwasher safe so they're easy to clean and BPA-free so you can rely on them for repeated use.

name: mountop Electric Protein Shaker Bottle, BPA-free & Leak-Proof Mixer Bottles for Pre Workout, Portable Shaker Cups for Protein Powder, Whey, and Other Supplements, 15oz
description:
About this item

Food-grade Material: The mountop electric shaker bottle is made of food-grade tritan, which is BPA-free and odorless, it gives you more peace of mind when mixing protein
Electric Shaker Bottle: Rotate the handle, fill in 2 aaa batteries, and then press the white button to start the shaker bottle, easy to use, and the ergonomic handle design allows you to carry the bottle anywhere
Leak-proof: The mountop mixing cup has a capacity of 450ml, perfect for your first cup of protein pre-workout, and it's leak-proof, so don't worry about it getting your documents or iPad wet.
Easy to Clean: The diameter of the bottle is 4cm, easy to fill and clean, when you use it for the first time, Simply pour in some warm water mixed with detergent, and use the cup brush to clean it.
Perfect Partner for the Gym: Superior Mixing Power for smooth shakes and better taste, perfect for protein shakes, pre and post workout drinks and meal replacements.

name: 700ml Shaker Bottle (Blue)
description: Introducing the 700ml BPA Free Sports Gym Plastic Protein Shaker Bottle, the perfect companion for all your fitness and health needs. This shaker bottle is designed to make your workout routine even more convenient and enjoyable, allowing you to effortlessly mix and carry your favorite protein shakes, smoothies, or other beverages on the go. Constructed from high-quality, durable plastic that is free from harmful BPA (Bisphenol A), this shaker bottle is not only safe for your health, but also built to last. Its 700ml capacity provides ample space for your liquid of choice, making it ideal for use during your gym sessions, sports activities, or outdoor adventures. Featuring a leak-proof flip-top lid and a secure screw-on cap, this shaker bottle ensures that your drinks stay where they belong - inside the bottle. The built-in mixing ball helps to break up clumps and create a smooth, lump-free drink with ease. The ergonomic design of the bottle makes it easy to hold and drink from, even when you're on the move. The clear measurement markings on the bottle allow you to accurately measure your ingredients, making it convenient for portion control or following recipes. The wide mouth design makes it easy to add and clean your ingredients, and the rounded edges inside prevent any residue from accumulating. With its sleek and modern design, this protein shaker bottle is not only functional, but also stylish. It comes in a variety of vibrant colors to suit your personal style and preferences. The durable plastic material is easy to clean, either by hand or in the dishwasher, making maintenance a breeze. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast, an athlete, or simply someone who enjoys a healthy lifestyle, the 700ml BPA Free Sports Gym Plastic Protein Shaker Bottle is a must-have accessory. Stay hydrated, energized, and stylish with this versatile and convenient shaker bottle that helps you reach your fitness goals in a smart and eco-friendly way. Upgrade your workout routine with this reliable and efficient shaker bottle today!

name: MEA PRODUCTS - Protein Shaker Bottle with Storage Containers - Leakproof 20oz/600ml Capacity Shakers for Protein Shakes with Mixer Ball and Carry Loop - Protein Shakers (Clear)
description:
About this item

20 oz Capacity, Leakproof: Quench your thirst with the 20 oz capacity of our leakproof protein shaker bottles. Carry your drinks confidently, knowing our shaker bottles for protein mixes are securely contained. Suitable for workouts and daily life.
Convenient Carry Loop: Seamlessly integrate your shake into your active lifestyle with the adjustable carry loop. Our shaker cups for protein shakes effortlessly take your favorite beverages on the go, even with full hands. Our protein shaker cup is ideal for the gym, work, or outdoor adventures
Smooth Mixing with Mixer Ball: Our protein shake bottle features a Mixer Ball wire whisk for consistently smooth shakes. No more clumps in your protein shakes with our mixer bottle. Enjoy perfectly blended drinks every time.
Extra Storage Containers: Our protein bottles shakers help you to stay organized two bonus detachable storage containers (150cc and 100cc) come in our protein shaker. Store protein powder, supplements, or snacks conveniently. Streamline your nutrition routine with these additional compartments.
Easy Sipping Spout: Sip your drinks easily and mess-free with the user-friendly drinking spout. We designed this protein powder shaker bottle for minimal spills, it's ideal for enjoying beverages on the move, whether at the gym or during daily activities.

name: JNSTU Protein Shaker Bottle,Electric Shaker Cup,Shaker Bottles for Protein Mixes,Workout Water Bottle,Bottle Blender,Shaker Cups for Protein Shakes and Meal Replacement,Portable Rechargeable 16oz
description:
JNSTU-Just you, Just for you!

We wholeheartedly develop higher-quality, safer, more durable and more economical products for you, all from the user's point of view, to solve customer needs, to make your life more convenient, easier and more efficient

JNSTU electric shaker bottle

A better way to make your protein shakes and other nutritional drinks!

Are you tired of long, manual shaking with your regular protein bottle only to discover unmixed lumps of powder while you take your first sip?
So were we! That‚Äôs why we created elecrtic Protein Shaker Bottle.
Not only does the Protein Shaker Bottle dissolve all clumps of powder, it does it in seconds! Forget about long, manual shaking. Just push the button and watch protein shaker bottle blend a smooth shake for you that is assured to taste smoother, and better than with your old-school shaker.

Smoother Taste

The electric shaker bottle With strong motor power, which can stir the protein powder more evenly, say goodbye to agglomeration, and the protein is more easily absorbed by the body

Excellent material

The bottle body is made of AS material, FDA food grade, non-toxic and tasteless, strong drop resistance, will not break under strong impact

Strong motor

The motor provides high-frequency stirring at 4800 revolutions per minute, which makes the stirring material dissolve quickly, saving time and physical strength

Dual scale display

The cup body has two scales in milliliters and ounces, making it easier for you to measure and handle food more accurately, to control the ratio of solids and liquids more precisely

Luminous Base

The shaking cup adopts type-C interface, which makes the charging speed faster; The cool luminous base adds more fun when making fitness drinks and it is also a battery indicator

Easy to use and carry

Moderate size, very convenient to carry at home or on the goÔºõThe cup body and base are detachable, you can remove the cup body separately for cleaning

features: „ÄêIncredible Power„Äë:JNSTU Electric Protein Shaker mixes protein powders together evenly with powerful motor power. It spins at 4800 rpm to ensure smooth mixing protein. Say goodbye to clumping and enjoy a silky smooth texture and easy absorption of into the body.,„ÄêSay Goodbye to Manual„ÄëCompared to traditional shaker bottles, it will mix evenly and more efficient.Just click once and wait 30 seconds and your shake is done, so easy! After using it I guess you will love this electric shaker cup.,„ÄêEasy to Clean „ÄëAdd water to the protein shaker bottle and turn on the stirring function to clean the insdie of the cup.The base is waterproofed to IPX5(IPX5 accepts normal water flow and cannot be completely submerged for long periods of time).Made of Tritan,100% BPA Free blender cup,remove the base you can put the cup in the dishwasher for cleaning.,„ÄêRechargeable Design„ÄëTwo months of use on a single charge of approximately 2 hours (based on a 3 times per week usage pattern performance may drop slightly when charge is low),„ÄêInnovative Light„Äë:The battery base is designed with a cool ambient light that produces a unique rotating light effect when stirring, making drinking protein shake after exercise also ritualistic,let you instantly become a bright star in the gym.

name: Super Hydro Protein Shaker Bottle - 28oz - Eco-Tritan, BPA-Free Shaker Blender Bottles For Protein Mixes with Leak-Proof Technology, Stainless Steel Mixing Balls, Measurement Markers (Midnight Blaze)
description: Elevate your hydration and fitness game with the Super Hydro Shaker Bottle in sleek Midnight Blaze, made from the ultra-durable and completely odorless Eco-Tritan material. Crafted with your health and well-being in mind, it's BPA-free and free from toxic chemicals or harmful additives, ensuring that every sip is safe and pure. This 28oz bottle is designed to make your life easier. It comes equipped with a shaker ball and boasts a rounded base for thorough mixing, guaranteeing smooth, lump-free protein shakes every time. The screw-top lid provides a secure seal, making it easy to add your favorite drinks and ice. But that's not all ‚Äì we've included perfect measurement marks for precise ingredient ratios, making it effortless to follow your favorite recipes. Cleaning up is a breeze with its easy-to-disassemble design, and thanks to the Eco-Tritan material, it remains odorless even after multiple uses. Plus, the convenient carry loop ensures easy transport and adds to its overall functionality. Choose Super Hydro for the perfect blend of style, convenience, and safety, whether you're at the gym or on the move.

description:
About this item

No Shaking. No Lumps. Better Taste ‚Äì performance vortex mixer with stainless steel trim, and patented X-Blade technology for super-smooth protein and supplement shakes (No solids - No solids - Add Water 1st, Protein 2nd))

name: Stainless Steel Protein Shaker Bottle Insulated Keeps Hot/Cold Dishwasher Safe/Double Wall/Odor Resistant/Sweatproof/Leakproof/BPA Free 20 oz (Silver)
description:
About this item

DOUBLE-WALL VACUUM - Stainless steel insulated protein shaker keeps cold drinks up to 30+ hours cold and keeps hot drinks up to 8 hours warm. Temperature of cold beverages raise only 1.8 degree Fahrenheit per hour in a room temperature of 71 degrees Fahrenheit.
LEAKFREE/ SHATTERPROOF - It is proven that a twist-on cap is at least two times more secure than a flip-top cap against spilling and leaking and the lid won‚Äôt burst open when dropped. No more accidental leaking/spilling leaving a mess and ruining your day. Our exclusive patented twist-on cap can be used for hot beverages because the inside air pressure can be released/ ‚Äògas off‚Äô through the sides of the twist-on cap while opening it slowly whereas flip-top can‚Äôt withhold shaking hot drinks.
ODOR RESISTANT/ EASY TO CLEAN - Our premium stainless steel does not absorb odor and is easy to clean without leaving any stains and it won‚Äôt rust. The last thing you want to have is smelly stinking shaker.
DISHWASHER SAFE - Shaker bottle and lid can be washed in a dishwasher. It‚Äôs dishwasher safe making clean-up so much easier and less hassle. Throw it in overnight and it‚Äôs ready the next morning!
2-YEAR GUARANTEE - We love our products. We love our customers and stand by both of them. Therefore, all of our products offer a free 2-year guarantee and 90 days no-questions asked return policy. Choose Hydro Flair risk free today. Click on the orange button to buy now!

name: VECH Protein Shaker Bottles with Powder Storage, 500ML Gym Sports Bottle for Protein Mixes Leak Proof Insulated Shaker Cups without Blending Ball Portable Water Bottle (Blue)
description:
About this item

„ÄêPERFECT FUNCTIONALITY„Äë The workout shaker bottle has a portable handle, and you can also hang it on your bag for easy portability. Sturdy and durable material, 100% leak proof! Don't worry about messing up your sports bag, this sports water bottle will accompany you and help you replenish nutrients in time, and enjoy the joy of sports freely!
„ÄêPRACTICAL DESIGN„ÄëThe large mouth design of this protein mixer makes it easy to pour protein powder into it, making it easier to clean; the design of the mouth to prevent choking makes it more convenient for you to drink water! Large capacity to meet the needs of life and sports, NOTE: Measurement markings go up to 18oz bottle, NOT to the brim.
„ÄêPOWERFUL USE„ÄëThe inside of this protein powder shaker bottle has a reasonable bottle body design without needing a stirring ball, you just need to close the lid and shake to mix the protein powder perfectly, and the powder will never get stuck in the bottom of the cup, good ideal for Pre-workout, Post-workout, Protein Shakes, Smoothies, and On the Go!
„ÄêSPACE SAVING„Äë Not just protein bottle shakers, this shaker bottle comes with 2 storage spaces, 30OZ protein powder storage, and medicine storage at the bottom, saving more space and meeting more of your needs! BPA free, safe and healthy, enjoy life happily!
„ÄêSINCERE SERVICE„Äë We have many years of experience in the production of shakers, and each product is strictly inspected. We will sincerely serve customers. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at any time, and we will answer you immediately .

name: BONMIXC Tritan Copolyester Shaker Bottle for Protein Mixes BPA/BPS/BPF Free Protein Shaker Bottle 800ml Sports Bottle 28oz White
description:
Leakproof Lid
Easy to Clean
Shatter Resistance
Lightweight & Stylish
Eco Friendly & Recyclable
Convenient Carrying Handle & Hook

Capacity : 28 Fluid Ounces / 800 ml
Materials : Tritan Copolyester (body) ; PP (lid & blending ball) ; Silicone (Sealing washer)
Temperature resistance : -10‚ÑÉ ~ 96‚ÑÉ
Recommended water temperature : 0‚ÑÉ ~ 60‚ÑÉ (Protect your oral and esophagus)

Innovative | Advanced | Quality

BPA-free isn't good enough anymore if you're using a plastic bottle. Tritan means free of not only BPA, short for bisphenol A, but also free of other chemicals that mimic the hormone estrogen. BONMIXC sports shaker bottle is made of Tritan, ensures your water or supplements stay clean and safe.

Odor Resistance
BPA/BPS/BPF Free
No Other Bisphenols
Chemical Resistance
Heat Resistance 96‚ÑÉ
Greater Toughness
Dishwasher Safe
Long Use Life

Taking advantage of all the benefits Tritan offers, with a frosted outer-coating for stylish, BONMIXC Shaker Bottle helps you stay refreshed and replenished.

Lighter weight than Stainless
Higher Impact Strength than Glass
Healthier than Any Other Plastics

Unique Handle & Hook

Being carried with your fingertips and hung on your backpack.

Simple & Leakproof Lid

No extra parts, the simple lid is one-click-open and 360¬∞ leakproof effectively.

Sports Bottle & Shaker Bottle

Use it as a sports water bottle, and also a shaker bottle with the blending ball for your supplements of whey protein powder.

WARNING 1

DON'T Shake Up Hot Water Over 60‚ÑÉ

The sharply increased air pressure inside the bottle will pop up the lid and make hot water spray with great force to hurt the user.

WARNING 2

DON'T Boil The Bottle

Constant boiling the bottle will deform and damage it.
descriptionHtml:
• Leakproof Lid
  • Easy to Clean
  • Shatter Resistance
  • Lightweight & Stylish
  • Eco Friendly & Recyclable
  • Convenient Carrying Handle & Hook
  • Capacity : 28 Fluid Ounces / 800 ml
  • Materials : Tritan Copolyester (body) ; PP (lid & blending ball) ; Silicone (Sealing washer)
  • Temperature resistance : -10‚ÑÉ ~ 96‚ÑÉ
  • Recommended water temperature : 0‚ÑÉ ~ 60‚ÑÉ (Protect your oral and esophagus)

Innovative | Advanced | Quality

BPA-free isn't good enough anymore if you're using a plastic bottle. Tritan means free of not only BPA, short for bisphenol A, but also free of other chemicals that mimic the hormone estrogen. BONMIXC sports shaker bottle is made of Tritan, ensures your water or supplements stay clean and safe.

  • Odor Resistance
  • BPA/BPS/BPF Free
  • No Other Bisphenols
  • Chemical Resistance
  • Heat Resistance 96‚ÑÉ
  • Greater Toughness
  • Dishwasher Safe
  • Long Use Life

Taking advantage of all the benefits Tritan offers, with a frosted outer-coating for stylish, BONMIXC Shaker Bottle helps you stay refreshed and replenished.

  • Lighter weight than Stainless
  • Higher Impact Strength than Glass
  • Healthier than Any Other Plastics

Unique Handle & Hook

Being carried with your fingertips and hung on your backpack.

Simple & Leakproof Lid

No extra parts, the simple lid is one-click-open and 360¬∞ leakproof effectively.

Sports Bottle & Shaker Bottle

Use it as a sports water bottle, and also a shaker bottle with the blending ball for your supplements of whey protein powder.

WARNING 1

DON'T Shake Up Hot Water Over 60‚ÑÉ

  • The sharply increased air pressure inside the bottle will pop up the lid and make hot water spray with great force to hurt the user.

WARNING 2

DON'T Boil The Bottle

  • Constant boiling the bottle will deform and damage it.

name: XTK Shaker Bottle Clear Protein Shaker Cup with Mixing Ball 16OZ Leak-Proof Extra-Durable Gym Bottle for Work Out,Shaker for Protein Power Shakes,Handle Portable,Curved Bottom,BPA Free(Pink)
description:
About this item

1.LEAKAGE PREVENTION: The shaker bottle has a leak-proof flap at the straight drink mouth and a hemispherical design on the inner wall of the cup mouth, which is tightly connected with the cup body thread, so that your bottle body will not leak even if it rotates 360 ¬∞
2.SAFETY MATERIAL: These protein shakers for shakes are crafted with BPA-free Tritan plastic, ensuring safety, durability, and scratch resistance. Use these premium quality shakers to mix protein powder or milk shakes, making your fitness routine safer and more enjoyable.
3.DOUBLE MIXING DESIGN: The inside of this smoothie bottle features a special capsule-shaped design that efficiently mixes your protein powder drink, leaving no clumps or residue. With the included stainless steel mixing ball, your mixing becomes even faster and more effective, allowing you to enjoy a silky smooth beverage in no time at all. In addition, this bottle with mixer can also be used as a regular sports water bottle when you don't need nutritional supplements.
4.EASY TO CLEAN: Our protein shake is extremely easy to clean, making it convenient and safe to use whether you choose to wash it by hand or in the dishwasher. With its smooth, curved design, there are no corners that can trap residue, ensuring a thorough clean every time.
5.EASY TO CARRY: This GYM supplement shaker cup is designed for convenience, featuring a lightweight construction and a comfortable silicone handle on the lid for easy portability. The cup body is crafted with engraved ounce and milliliter markings, ensuring precise measurements for adding ingredients like protein powder. With this cup, you can confidently track your daily intake and ensure accurate ingredient proportions. For any inquiries, please don't hesitate to contact us.

name: Artoid Mode Inspirational Fitness Workout Sports Protein Shaker Bottle 24-Ounce, Dual Mixing Technology with Shaker Balls & Mixing Grids Included, Twist and Lock Protein Box Storage Included
description:
About this item

Inspirational Shaker Bottle with Quote: Push Limits. Inspirational sayings inspire you, get you going and keep you moving, it will make you have an incredible experience while you exercise
Dual Mixing Design: Each bottle comes with its own whisk and mix ball to make protein mixing as efficient as possible. It makes the mixing process incredibly easy and improves the flavor of the shake, perfect for your favorite drinks, protein shakes, smoothies or anything you want
Dishwasher Safe: Once shaken, stirred, and completely consumed, simply place the bottle in the dishwasher for an easy and effortless clean. We recommend hand washing the lid to increase longevity of the bottle and keep it at its best
Rust-proof and Easy Clean Mix Ball: Unlike most metal ball, our ball is made from top quality plastic material which is rust proof, never chip or peel. It is safe to leave the ball inside the bottle while you are enjoying the drinks, and you can wash it in your dishwasher without worrying about damaging it
100% BPA Free & Storage Compartment: Our bottles are made from 100% Toxin Free material that is safe to your body and environmentally friendly. It has a detachable jar to store almost everything, including your favorite snacks, supplements as well as your vitamin and supplement tablets

name: G Fuel Dysmo Shaker Bottle, Drink Mixer for Pre Workout, Protein Shake, Smoothie Mix, Meal Replacement Shakes, Energy Powder and More, Blender Cup, Portable Safe, BPA Free Plastic - 16 oz
description:
About this item

DYSMO SHAKER CUP: Need something to help you get a sharper edge out there in the warzone? Here, hold this: the Dysmo Shaker Bottle, inspired by FPS aficionado Dysmo. You‚Äôll be pumped you added this striking purple drink shaker, complete with a tomahawk-embedded Dysmo logo, to your loadout as you shake up your favorite G Fuel flavor, lock in and grind for Ws. ‚ÄúHave a great day!‚Äù
MIXES WELL: No need to worry about the hassle of cleaning and looking after a shaker ball anymore. The top of our blender cup is designed to do all the work. Simply use the cup to mix your favorite G Fuel energy powder with water, give it a few good shakes, and voila! You have a delicious energy drink that'll help you combat anything.
LEAK-PROOF DESIGN: Say goodbye to messy spills! Our blender bottle features a secure locking lid that ensures a leak-proof seal during vigorous shaking or while on-the-go.
VERSATILE USE: G Fuel's blender bottle shaker can be used to create any beverage of your choosing! The mixing glass holds up to 16 oz of liquid, and can be used to effortlessly blend G Fuel energy powders, or to create smoothies, cocktails, pre workout or post workout protein shakes and more!
SAFE, BPA FREE PLASTIC: Made from high-quality, BPA-free plastic, G Fuel Shaker Bottles are safe and built to withstand daily use.

name: HELIMIX 2.0 Vortex Blender Shaker Bottle Holds upto 28oz | No Blending Ball or Whisk | USA Made | Portable Pre Workout Whey Protein Drink Shaker Cup | Mixes Cocktails Smoothies Shakes | Top Rack Safe
description:
About this item

üö´ NO SHAKING ACCESSORIES NEEDED - Forget the days of looking for your wire shaker ball and buying shaker ball replacements because the Helimix uses a patented vortex blender design that doesn't require anything but a few good shakes. This also means you don't have to worry about a clogged or dirty shaker balls ruining your protein shake.
üèÜ SUPERIOR SUPPLEMENT MIXING - Helimix has been rigorously tested against other mixer cups to ensure you get the best shaker bottle on the market. Our patented vortex design allows for optimal mixing of any powder supplement.
üëÉ ODOR RESISTANT MATERIAL - Helimix is made with Copolyester Plastic, which makes the cup odor resistant so you don't have to gag down your sports drinks. It's also 100% BPA/BPS-free plastic to ensure supplements stay clean.

ü§ù LEAK PROOF GUARANTEE - If it leaks please contact us and we'll make sure you're issues are resolved. We pride ourselves in our quality products and customer service. Also, the patented design of Helimix includes a sturdy loop for easy transport to and from the gym. The Helimix is just the right size that fits in nearly all cup holders.

name: 28 Oz Large Shaker Bottles for Protein Mixes, Shaker Bottle with Stainless Steel Wire Whisk Ball, Protein Shaker Bottle, Shaker Cup, Protein Shaker, Protein Shake Bottle, Bottle Shaker, Shake Bottle
description:
About this item

Package includes 1 shaker bottle with a blender ball, perfect for mixing protein shakes, smoothies, and supplements.
RH shaker bottle is made of high-quality plastic and is BPA- and phthalate-free, featuring a push and screw-on lid with a flip cap to keep the mouthpiece clean of debris for the shake bottle.
RH shaker bottle comes with a sturdy loop top so that you can carry it easily and hook it somewhere for storage.
RH shaker bottle has a 28-ounce capacity, so plenty of space is available to mix your favorite protein drink. This way, you can take your protein shake to the gym and carry it instead of your regular water bottle for better nutrition.
The blender ball with the shaker bottle whips the liquid and cuts through powders, allowing you to make protein shakes on your way to the gym‚Äîno need to carry multiple accessories.

description:

Double-wall vacuum insulated BlenderBottle, for mixing supplements and smoothies, keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours
Features a 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall Whisk that mixes when the bottle is shaken, for smooth shakes in seconds
26-ounce capacity (markings go to 18 ounces) offers plenty of room for supplements, meal replacements, or water
Twist-on cap with center-mounted spout seals with a quarter-turn and is backed by a Leak-Proof Guarantee
Made from high-quality BPA and phthalate-free materials; hand wash cup, dishwasher-safe lid; not for use with hot liquids

name: Promixx Pursuit Shaker Bottle Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle and Blender Cup, 18oz, Midnight Blue
description:
Mix & Chill

The Pursuit Stainless Steel Shaker Bottle by PROMiXX has been designed with sustainability, functionality and elegance in mind. The removable agitator means no rattling ball and no mess for a perfect mix. The vacuum-insulated bottle ensures your protein shakes are perfectly chilled!

Previous page

Stylish, Ergonomic and Durable Shaker (18oz/550ml)

High grade stainless-steel bottle that's impact resistant, long lasting, soft to touch & recyclable.

Agitator Designed for Optimal Protein Mixes

Integrated and easily removable agitator for the perfect mix ‚Äì no rattling blender ball, no mess.

Detachable Snap-fit Agitator for Easy Cleaning

Snap-fit agitator and curved cup makes for easy cleaning ‚Äì it‚Äôs also top-rack dishwasher safe.

Flip-cap Sports Lid with Ultra-performance Seals

Sports lid with convenient carry loop, and flip-cap and ergonomic mouthpiece that feels good.

Dual Wall Vacuum Insulated Bottle

Dual wall vacuum-insulated bottle to keep your supplement and protein mixes perfectly chilled.

Next page

1 Stainless Steel Bottle 2 No Rattling Ball! 3 Easy Clean 4 Dynamic Sports Lid 5 Dual Wall Insulation

A Powerful Mix

1 million+ Happy Customers

Global leaders in mixing technology, PROMiXX has sold over a million products. Endorsed by athletes worldwide ‚Äì performance mixing is in our DNA.

Sustainable, Clean Cup

Created from recyclable high grade stainless steel, the Pursuit bottle is odor and stain resistant, and BPA-free ‚Äì so your protein shakes stays clean.

Perfect Mix: No Rattling Ball

Integrated and easily removable agitator for the perfect mix ‚Äì no rattling blender ball, no mess!

Vacuum Insulated Bottle

The Pursuit Stainless Steel shaker has a dual wall vacuum-insulated bottle to keep your protein mixes perfectly chilled.

What's included with

Shaker Bottle Pursuit - Stainless Steel

1 x Stainless Steel, Vacuum Insulated & Impact-resistant Cup

1 x Leakproof Sports Lid with Carry Loop

1 x Soft-edge Domed Snap-fit Agitator

1 x Swing Tag with Instructions

Wash thoroughly before use. For best results add liquid before adding your powder. WARNING ‚Äì DO NOT use hot liquids. Hot or warm liquids may create pressure build-up causing the flip-cap to open and spray contents. Fasten securely before shaking and always open with care. Hand wash only.

description:
About this item

100% Stainless Steel
With its innovative design and high-quality construction, our shaker bottle is equipped with a built-in blender ball that effortlessly mixes protein shakes, smoothie mixes, and other protein supplements, ensuring a smooth and clump-free consistency every time. Whether you're shopping for your loved ones, mom, dad, or friends, our shaker bottle is a practical and thoughtful gift that they will appreciate.
In addition to its shaker capabilities, our stainless steel bottle serves as a reliable water bottle, allowing you to stay hydrated throughout your day, whether you're at the gym, office, or exploring new destinations during your travels. Its durable construction ensures long-lasting use, while the stainless steel material maintains the temperature of your beverages, keeping them cold or hot for extended periods. ( BPA free ).
Invest in our premium stainless steel shaker bottle and elevate your fitness routine, stay hydrated, and enjoy the convenience of a multi-purpose bottle that combines the functionality of shaker bottles, protein shakers, and water bottles. Experience the difference in quality, design, and performance with our versatile shaker bottle, the ultimate companion for active individuals seeking convenience and functionality in one product.

The problem is that buying them at your local convenience or supplement store is not cheap.Why buy them when you can control the ingredients you put in them right at home? They‚Äôll be healthier and save you loads of money. Using the right bottle for your shakes is important. As the name says, they need to be shaken! That‚Äôs what these bottles are designed to do.
They help mix all of the ingredients quickly without any leaks! You‚Äôll never have a floor or shirt full of smoothie ingredients when you use these innovative bottles.
They‚Äôre also phenomenal for making homemade dressings and sauces.

name: Protein Shaker Bottle for Protein Mixes, 17 OZ, Leak Proof ‚óè Easy Clean Up ‚óè BPA Free, Tasteless, Safe Material ‚óè No Blending Ball or Whisk Needed ‚óè Blender Shaker Bottle ‚óè Gym shaker bottle (White)
description:
Our bottles are presented in 6 beautiful different colors. A bottle can contain 17 oz / 500 ml in the main container and an additional 3 oz / 88.7 ml in each of the two small separate containers (which you can easily screw to the shaker bottle). Therefore, by purchasing this Shaker Bottle you can take with you both the fluid you intend to drink after your workout, and the amount of protein you intend to shake in it. The tightly threaded screw-on lid creates a leadproof seal.

3-in-1 Blender Bottle Pack: Designed with a standard protein shaker cup and two screw-on attachments, including a powder container and sectioned pill container, we‚Äôve made storing proteins, vitamins, and supplements even easier on the go. Efficient Mixing: Stainless steel shaker bottles for protein mixes use a spiral spring stirrer, which can mix the protein shake faster than the stirring ball, so that it will not clump while shaking it will hit the bottom so that there is no more residue on the bottom. Portable non-slip and leak-proof: Our protein mixer bottle is suitable for most car cup holders and bicycle water bottle holders. It is convenient for you to carry around. The cup body has scale marks. In addition, the design of the flip cover is absolutely leak-proof, splash-proof and non-slip, the first choice for fitness outings. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee: If you have any problem with our Sports Shaker Water Bottle or questions, please kindly contact us for direction, exchange, refund or return.

Say goodbye to lumpy shakes and enjoy your favorite protein blends with ease.,We understand the importance of convenience and reliability, which is why our shaker bottle features a leak-proof lid and advanced sealing technology, guaranteeing a spill-free experience. No more worries about accidental leaks or messes in your gym bag or backpack. Simply prepare your protein mixes, securely close the lid, and carry it with confidence wherever you go.,Not only is our shaker bottle functional, but it's also stylish and makes for a fantastic gift choice. Available in various attractive colors, it is suitable for both men and women, making it a versatile gift option for occasions such as birthdays, Christmas, and other special events. Whether you're shopping for your loved ones, mom, dad, or friends, our shaker bottle is a practical and thoughtful gift that they will appreciate.,In addition to its shaker capabilities, our stainless steel bottle serves as a reliable water bottle, allowing you to stay hydrated throughout your day, whether you're at the gym, office, or exploring new destinations during your travels. Its durable construction ensures long-lasting use, while the stainless steel material maintains the temperature of your beverages, keeping them cold or hot for extended periods. ( BPA free ).,Invest in our premium stainless steel shaker bottle and elevate your fitness routine, stay hydrated, and enjoy the convenience of a multi-purpose bottle that combines the functionality of shaker bottles, protein shakers, and water bottles. Experience the difference in quality, design, and performance with our versatile shaker bottle, the ultimate companion for active individuals seeking convenience and functionality in one product.

name: QYNuLi Protein Shaker Bottle Sports Bottle Classic Protein Mixer Shaker Bottle with Mixball Sport Supplement Shakers for Protein Powder Enzyme Powder and Shakes
description:
About this item

„ÄêMaterial„ÄëThis water bottle is made of high quality polypropylene material, BPA free, food grade material for peace of mind. Made of 304 stainless steel mixing ball, easy to shake all kinds of powder.
„ÄêSize„Äë3.54*3.54*7.36 in/90 *90*187 mm for 500ml, made for sports, a good partner for sports and fitness.
„ÄêAdvantage„ÄëThe spiral-shaped cup body and the bottle cap are tightly seamed to keep your gym bag and car seat dry at all times. Tighten the bottle cap and you can shake it 360 degrees after the cap is closed.
„ÄêUnique Design„ÄëThe unique one-piece hanging ring design, combined with the cap streamline shape more beautiful, easy to carry daily, just a finger, you can lift it. When you are at the gym, you can also hang your keys on it.
„ÄêApplication„ÄëThis shaker bottle is suitable for protein powder, enzyme powder, coffee and other kinds of powder substances. You can use it to shake all kinds of powders, and any thick ingredients can be mixed evenly, so you can enjoy smooth and delicious drinks.
