name: AVSAMOQ Protein Shaker Bottle with Powder Storage Container 16oz Shaker Cup for Protein Mixes - Attachable Container Storage for Protein or Supplements - Blender Bottle with Wire Whisk Ball (Black)
description:
3-in-1 Protein Shaker BottlesÔºö

Daily workouts and routines can be mundane, but that doesn't mean the nutritional shakes you drink do, too.

You can add peanut butter, applesauce or yogurt ingredients Add a shake to your protein/shake to add flavor.

How to use:

You just put what you want to mix into the bottle, and of course that stainless steel mixing ball, tighten the lid, and press the flip cap, one hand up and down, left and right, whatever you shake until you mix into the effect you want.

Easy Open, Easy Close

Just one touch is all it takes,the bottle opens effortlessly with the push of a button. Snap shut the locking lid for a quick, confident leak-proof seal.

The Double Scale Side Markings

Our leak-proof water bottle has a 450ml (16oz) capacity and features dual graduated measurement markings.

Leak-proof Lid

When you shake energetically,the lid on the top won't be crashed open by water.in addition,all interfaces are well sealed.

Package includes:

1 * leak proof locking lid

1 * 450ml (16oz) capacity shaker bottle

1 * 150cc (5.1oz) connectable protein powder storage compartment

1 * 100cc (3.4oz) connectable protein powder storage compartment

1 * pill box 1*metal ball stirrer

Note:

-Do not add hot water and shake. The stirring of the hot liquid will increase the pressure inside the cup, which will flush the top flap.

- In addition, please do not use hot water to clean the cup, though pp material heat resistance is high, but hot water to join the uneven heat will lead to cup deformation.

features: „ÄêTwist Off Cups with Attachable Storage Compartments„ÄëThis removable storage compartment twist cup comes with 1 capacity 150cc (5.1oz), 1 capacity 100cc (3.4oz) and 1 pill/calcium tablet compartment.This shaker bottle attaches and removes storage compartments by twisting and rotating.The large protein powder storage compartment makes it easy to take more refills on the go, so you can add protein powder to your drink on the go!,„ÄêMultifunctional Design with Compartments„ÄëThis protein shaker bottle comes with a removable pill/calcium tablet compartment.Make it easy to access your medication or supplements anytime, anywhere.This blender bottle is suitable for anyone, especially those who need to take daily medication or calcium supplements.They are great for taking protein powder, vitamins, and pills ,ideal companion for mixing protein shakes, smoothies, and supplements before or after workouts.,„ÄêSafe and Durable„ÄëThis shaker bottle is made of food-grade, heat-resistant plastic material that is BPA-free and safe for everyday use.The bottle itself is very sturdy, environmentally friendly and scratch resistant!The frosted finish gives them a stylish look wherever you want to go, and the strong loop handle allows you to carry your protein blender bottle with you wherever you go.,„ÄêLeak-proof and High-Quality Wire Whisk Ball„ÄëThis shaker cup has a built-in pressure-resistant leak-proof seal to increase the leak-proof function.Our protein mixer bottles are equipped with high quality stainless steel mixing balls.When you add it to a shaker, it mixes the protein powder and other ingredients quickly and evenly, preventing clumps or particles and ensuring your drink is smooth and tasty, providing a convenient way to take powdered supplements.,„Äê450ML/16oz Scale Side Markings„ÄëOur leak-proof water bottle has a 450ml (16oz) capacity and features two unit scale measurement markings.It has embossed ounce and milliliter markings on the side, allowing you to easily control your water intake and ensure you know exactly how much protein powder you're adding and how much of the supplement you're drinking.This is an ideal sports bottle for instant protein shakes and supplemental drinks.

description:
About this item

CLASSIC STYLING: This carefully crafted, 24oz / 700ml cocktail shaker is a must have for any mixologist and its stylish, classic lines make it ideal bar decor for home.
BUILT IN STRAINER: A convenient ice strainer built in to the lid helps make the most perfectly chilled cocktails. Fill, shake and pour easily and cleanly!
ESSENTIAL BARTENDING KIT: Great for home bars, parties and entertaining with friends. This quality clear shaker bottle with ample 24oz / 700 ml capacity is big enough to make multiple servings.
MESS FREE: Cocktail shaker bottle lid fits securely & prevents leaks with its specially engineered cap. Included measurement markings on the body help with building the perfect cocktail recipe.
EASY CARE: Durable and hard wearing clear plastic construction. Recommended hand washing with mild soap between uses.

About this item

This protein blender bottle is sure to turn heads and make a statement. You have one tough Dad Bod and are proud! Walk through the gym doors with your head held high and Dad Bod Nutrition protein shaker bottle in hand.

name: HELIMIX 2.0 Vortex Blender Shaker Bottle Holds upto 28oz | No Blending Ball or Whisk | USA Made | Portable Pre Workout Whey Protein Drink Shaker Cup | Mixes Cocktails Smoothies Shakes | Top Rack Safe
description:
About this item

üö´ NO SHAKING ACCESSORIES NEEDED - Forget the days of looking for your wire shaker ball and buying shaker ball replacements because the Helimix uses a patented vortex blender design that doesn't require anything but a few good shakes. This also means you don't have to worry about a clogged or dirty shaker balls ruining your protein shake.
üèÜ SUPERIOR SUPPLEMENT MIXING - Helimix has been rigorously tested against other mixer cups to ensure you get the best shaker bottle on the market. Our patented vortex design allows for optimal mixing of any powder supplement.
üëÉ ODOR RESISTANT MATERIAL - Helimix is made with Copolyester Plastic, which makes the cup odor resistant so you don't have to gag down your sports drinks. It's also 100% BPA/BPS-free plastic to ensure supplements stay clean.
üßº DURABLE & EASY TO CLEAN - Helimix uses shatter-proof Copolyester plastic. And once your workout is done, throw the Helimix in your dishwasher for a quick and easy clean. Most other shaker bottles are made of cheap plastic and are breakable.
ü§ù LEAK PROOF GUARANTEE - If it leaks please contact us and we'll make sure you're issues are resolved. We pride ourselves in our quality products and customer service. Also, the patented design of Helimix includes a sturdy loop for easy transport to and from the gym. The Helimix is just the right size that fits in nearly all cup holders.

features: DIGI-TEAL SHAKER CUP: Cool down as the action heats up with G Fuel's Digi-Teal Shaker Bottle. Bearing a striking orange-and-teal color scheme with warzone-ready camouflage accents, it‚Äôs easy to see why the Digi-Teal drink shaker is the ideal summertime squadmate. You have a delicious energy drink that'll help you combat anything.,LEAK-PROOF DESIGN: Say goodbye to messy spills! Our blender bottle features a secure locking lid that ensures a leak-proof seal during vigorous shaking or while on-the-go.,VERSATILE USE: G Fuel's blender bottle shaker can be used to create any beverage of your choosing! name: JNSTU Protein Shaker Bottle,Electric Shaker Cup,Shaker Bottles for Protein Mixes,Workout Water Bottle,Bottle Blender,Shaker Cups for Protein Shakes and Meal Replacement,Portable Rechargeable 16oz
description:
JNSTU-Just you, Just for you!

We wholeheartedly develop higher-quality, safer, more durable and more economical products for you, all from the user's point of view, to solve customer needs, to make your life more convenient, easier and more efficient

JNSTU electric shaker bottle

A better way to make your protein shakes and other nutritional drinks!

Are you tired of long, manual shaking with your regular protein bottle only to discover unmixed lumps of powder while you take your first sip?
So were we! That‚Äôs why we created elecrtic Protein Shaker Bottle.
Not only does the Protein Shaker Bottle dissolve all clumps of powder, it does it in seconds! Forget about long, manual shaking. Just push the button and watch protein shaker bottle blend a smooth shake for you that is assured to taste smoother, and better than with your old-school shaker.

Smoother Taste

The electric shaker bottle With strong motor power, which can stir the protein powder more evenly, say goodbye to agglomeration, and the protein is more easily absorbed by the body

Excellent material

The bottle body is made of AS material, FDA food grade, non-toxic and tasteless, strong drop resistance, will not break under strong impact

Strong motor

The motor provides high-frequency stirring at 4800 revolutions per minute, which makes the stirring material dissolve quickly, saving time and physical strength

Dual scale display

The cup body has two scales in milliliters and ounces, making it easier for you to measure and handle food more accurately, to control the ratio of solids and liquids more precisely

Luminous Base

The shaking cup adopts type-C interface, which makes the charging speed faster; The cool luminous base adds more fun when making fitness drinks and it is also a battery indicator

Easy to use and carry

Moderate size, very convenient to carry at home or on the goÔºõThe cup body and base are detachable, you can remove the cup body separately for cleaning

name: The Coldest Chug Lid and Shaker Lid for Wide Mouth Bottles for Protein shakes, healthy shakes, Gym Lid (Galaxy Purple, Wide Mouth)
description: The shake drinkers‚Äô dream, The Coldest Chug Lid has arrived. Compatible with all of your wide-mouth Coldest bottles, and built with reinforced locking mechanisms, this chug lid will persevere the toughest gym days with you. No more wearing your pre-workout to the gym, the clasp PLUS the push to release button makes sure that cap stays closed when shaking up your favorite powders. Simply pull open the clasp when done shaking and now the push to release button will make one-handed drinking a breeze. The chug lid blender attachment is optional to use, simply twist to remove and use only the lid.

name: Enituo Electric Protein Shaker Bottles, 28oz Protein Shake Mixer Portable Gym Mixer Cup Shaker Cups | USB Rechargeable | Made with Tritan | BPA Free (Black)
description:
About this item

Upgraded Electric Protein Shaker Bottle: Unlike traditional shaker bottle, our shaker bottle mixes protein powders evenly with built-in motor power. The powerful motor makes the blade spin at up to 6500¬±10%rpm, fully and quickly blending protein powder and water for a smooth taste, say goodbye to clumping and enjoy a silky smooth texture and easy absorption of protein into the body
28oz Large Capacity, BPA free Tritan Material: Our electric protein shaker bottle has a large capacity of 28oz/800ml(marking goes to 24oz/700ml), working great to meet your protein needs when you are at work, travel or exercise. The mixer cup's body is made of Tritan, the mixing blade is made of Food-Grade ABS, absolutely BPA-Free, heat-resistant and durable
High Performance Battery: Our Mixer Cup is equipped with premium 700mAh lithium battery, 2 hours of charge sustains 26 times of use for mixing protein powder. That means it will last for 2 months on a single charge based on 3 times a week of use, so you don't have to worry about charging it frequently!
Easy to Carry, Easy to Clean: After each use shaker bottle, only add a tiny drop of detergent or hot water, then press the button. Besides, the battery section is completely self-contained and detachable, so you can place the bottle body in the dishwasher (do not put the base in the dishwasher for your safety). And this coffee/supplement blender electric has a nonslip wide silicone handle, easy to use and carry
Great Gift Idea for Workout Enthusiasts: The shaker cup is the best gift for fitness enthusiasts and commuters on Birthdays, Christmas, Thanksgiving, etc. We promise 30-day money-back and a 12-month warranty, any dissatisfaction can be returned by contacting us

name: LHHW Electric Protein Shaker Bottles - 24 oz Rechargeable Vortex Mixer Cup | BPA Free | Made with Tritan | For Making Protein ShakesÔºà24oz, night black
description:
About this item

„ÄêSay Goodbye to "LUMPS"„Äë- Blackube's Electric Protein Shaker mixes protein powders together evenly with powerful motor power. It spins at 4800 rpm to ensure smooth mixing and no clumping. Say goodbye to clumping and enjoy a silky smooth texture and easy absorption of protein into the body.
„ÄêEasy To Use„Äë- Free your hands, no balls needed! Just click once, wait 30 seconds, and your shake is done, so easy! Compared to traditional hand shake bottles, it will be evenly mixed and no more big chunks of powder floating in the air.
„ÄêMagnetic Charging Method„Äë- Our electric mixer features an original magnetic socket contact charging for easy charging and mobility, and is also IPX5 waterproof. Enjoy two months of use with just one charge of about 2 hours (based on a three-times-a-week usage pattern)
„ÄêHassle Free Cleanup„Äë- Pour neutral detergent into our shaker cup, or just water, and double-tap the motor button to clean yourself. Let the shaker cup create a whirlpool and rinse! What's more, after separating the charged base, you can put the cup in the dishwasher for cleaning.
„ÄêAfter Sales Service„Äë- We offer a long term warranty (2 years) and a two month trial period, any dissatisfaction can be returned by contacting us. The blackube electric vortex mixer is made of Tritan and is BPA free, so feel free to use it! The best electric protein shaker.

name: G Fuel The Outlaw Shaker Bottle, Drink Mixer for Pre Workout, Protein Shake, Smoothie Mix, Meal Replacement Shakes, Energy Powder and More, Blender Cup, Portable Safe, BPA Free Plastic - 16 oz
description:
About this item

THE OUTLAW SHAKER CUP: Introducing The Outlaw Shaker Bottle styled after the red and orange sunset you‚Äôll surely ride into once you‚Äôve attained redemption. Fill it with your favorite G Fuel flavor to help you grab Ws, Wild West-style!
MIXES WELL: No need to worry about the hassle of cleaning and looking after a shaker ball anymore. The top of our blender cup is designed to do all the work. SAFE, BPA FREE PLASTIC: Made from high-quality, BPA-free plastic, G Fuel Shaker Bottles are safe and built to withstand daily use.

Stainless steel, spill-proof BlenderBottle, for mixing supplements and smoothies, features an easy-open/easy-close push-button flip cap with a sliding lock to prevent accidental opening
24-ounce capacity (interior markings go to 20 ounces) offers plenty of room for supplements, meal replacements, or water

name: The Vinchu Blender Shaker Bottle - Top Tier Stainless Steel and Triple-Wall Insulation Water Bottle for Cold Protein, Prework-Out and Fitness Shakes (White)
description:
About this item

üßä Discover the ultimate in beverage perfection with the Vinchu Shaker Bottle, a versatile marvel crafted with top-notch technology. With triple-wall insulation and a copper-lined middle layer, this stainless steel bottle ensures your drinks stay cold for up to 12 hours. Whether you're at the gym or on the move, this insulated shaker bottle guarantees your beverages remain at the ideal temperature. Say goodbye to lukewarm shakes and hello to the perfect blend, courtesy of our Vinchu Blender Bottle.
üîí Seal your beverages effortlessly with our 25 oz Stainless Steel Shaker Bottle, featuring a carved-down lid for smooth closing and double-click security. It blends protein powder and supplements in seconds with its built-in wire whisk, doubling as a stainless steel blender bottle. Leak-proof and eco-friendly, this BPA-free steel shaker offers insulation, maintaining drink temperatures while on the move. Elevate your fitness routine with this convenient, stylish companion!
üíß Bid farewell to health risks linked to plastic bottles with our Vinchu bottle. This high-quality shaker bottle, engineered from top-quality 304 stainless steel and phthalate-free materials, guarantees durability and safety. It's not just a durable shaker bottle; it's your stainless steel water bottle with a built-in mixer, making it portable and ideal for sports enthusiasts. Ensure non-toxic consumption while doubling as a stainless steel protein mixer. Your well-being is our top priority.
üí™ Seamlessly integrate essential supplements into your active lifestyle. Our high-quality stainless steel wire whisk simplifies on-the-go nutrition. With each shake, experience the vitality of well-blended supplements, fueling your fitness gains. This portable tool isn't just about convenience; it's an investment in your well-being. Witness your strength and health progress with every use. Empower your fitness journey with effortless, effective nutrition today.
üå±Crafted from high-grade 304 stainless steel, it ensures durability and sustainability. This insulated shaker bottle not only keeps your drinks but also minimizes carbon emissions by eliminating the need for frequent replacements. Whether you're at the gym or on the go, our leak-proof shaker bottle guarantees convenient and eco-friendly hydration. Join the movement towards a greener planet with Vinchu stainless steel shaker bottle, a symbol of both quality and environmental consciousness!

name: BlenderBottle Just for Fun Classic 28-Ounce Shaker Bottle, Avo Cardio,Green
description: The BlenderBottle Just for Fun Classic 28-Ounce Shaker Cup makes it easy to keep a sense of humor at the gym, with food-inspired designs that spark conversation and compliments. Featuring a patented mixing system‚Äîwith a 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall wire whisk (found only in BlenderBottle brand shaker cups) that moves freely inside the bottle to smooth out drink mixes and meal ingredients‚Äîit‚Äôs ideal for protein shakes, smoothies, fiber drinks, and meal replacements. It‚Äôs also a handy kitchen tool for mixing pancake batter, scrambled eggs, and salad dressings. The wide mouth makes it easy to add scoops of powdered mixes, meal ingredients, and liquids, and embossed markings show both ounces and milliliters for easy measuring anywhere (note that markings on the 28-ounce capacity shaker cup only go up to 20 ounces). Bottle contents and liquids are securely contained thanks to a tightly threaded screw-on lid that creates a leakproof seal, and a flip cap that snaps securely shut for shaking and transportation. The convenient loop top makes it easy to carry the bottle and offers a place to attach car keys while at the gym. The Blender Bottle Just for Fun Classic 28-Ounce Shaker Bottle can also be used as a water bottle; the ball can be left inside, as it will never rust, chip, or peel. BPA and phthalate-free, dishwasher safe..

description:
About this item

Eco Friendly: Shaker bottle for the health-conscious & environmentally friendly. Made from biodegradable wheat straw, BPA Free, Non-Toxic, Natural, Non-allergenic, Gluten Free resources

Inspirational words printed on the mug 'Nothing is Impossible!'

name: Almased Protein Powder for Weight Loss Kit for Men & Women, Metabolism Booster, Natural Meal Replacement Shake for Weight Loss, Supplement, 27 Grams of Protein Per Serving (Almond Vanilla Flavor, 2 Cans @ 17.6 oz ea + Shaker Bottle + Scoop)
description:
About this item

Almased Protein Powder for Weight Loss Kit for Men & Women, Metabolism Booster, Natural Meal Replacement Shake for Weight Loss, Supplement, 27 Grams of Protein Per Serving (Original Flavor, 2 Cans @ 17.6 oz ea + Shaker Bottle)
METABOLISM BOOSTER FOR WEIGHT LOSS- Only meal replacement shakes for weight loss with natural bioactive peptides and digestive enzymes that boosts metabolism, burns fat, keeps lean muscle and retains energy.
HIGH-QUALITY PROTEIN- Only protein powder for weight loss with complete amino acid profile designed for optimal absorption, retaining and growing lean muscle, 27g of protein per serving, 4,7g BCAAs
ALL-NATURAL- No added sugar, no artificial flavors, no fillers, no preservatives and no stimulants, gluten-free and non-GMO, 180 calories, packed with vitamins and minerals
EASY TO MIX- add 8 tablespoons of delicious Almased protein powder with 10-12 oz of water, skim milk, oat milk, almond milk or cold brew coffee in a glass or shaker, add low-sugar fruits (optional).

name: Jarvis Protein Shaker Bottle with Small Stainless Shaker Bal Flip Top Protein Shake Bottle, Keeps Cold/Hot - Pre Workout Shaker Bottle Leak Proof Seal with Carrying Loop, BPA Free, White 20 oz / 591ml
description:
About this item

ULTIMATE MIXING POWER: Elevate your shakers for protein shakes, pre workout drinks, and protein mixes with the high-performance Jarvis Protein Shaker Bottle. Its advanced shaker ball ensures thorough blending, leaving no room for clumps or uneven texture
PREMIUM QUALITY AND VERSATILITY: Discover the pinnacle of quality and functionality with the Jarvis shaker bottles for protein mixes. Ideal for protein mixer, pre workout supplements, and more, this versatile blender bottle meets all your fitness needs in one convenient package
LEAKPROOF DESIGN FOR ON-THE-GO: Stay active without worrying about leaks or spills. Our protein bottle are meticulously crafted to provide a secure, leakproof seal, making them the perfect companion for your workouts, travels, and busy lifestyle.
BPA-FREE AND SAFE: Your health and well-being matter to us. That's why the Jarvis pre workout Bottle is constructed from high-quality, BPA-free materials, ensuring a safe and toxin-free experience as you enjoy your protein powder mixes and shakes.
TRAVEL-FRIENDLY AND ERGONOMIC: Whether you're hitting the gym or embarking on an adventure, our protein shake bottle are designed with your convenience in mind. With a compact and ergonomic design, including a handy protein shaker handle, they make it effortless to carry and enjoy your favorite protein drinks on the go

name: 16 Oz Protein Shaker Bottle, Protein Shaker Bottle With Powder Storage, Fresh Juice Blender Bottle, Water Bottle for Gym
description:
About this item

„ÄêEasy To Use„ÄëThe functional whisk parts that comes with the shaker bottle whips the liquid and cuts through powders, allowing you to make protein shakes on your way to the gym. No need to carry multiple accessories. Protein shaker have a soft feel, tight seal with no leaking when shaking.
„ÄêMEASUREMENT MARKS„ÄëIt is convenient to measure the capacity of effluent. Blender bottles is easy to clean, blend drinks quickly.
„ÄêSTURDY MATERIAL„ÄëShaker cup is made of National food-grade material and Stainless steel that is 100% BPA free and non-toxic. We thickened the cup lid to prevent it from cracking.
„ÄêMULTI STORAGE DESIGN„ÄëThe option for multiple compartments makes carrying other supplements super convenient. The 6 oz capacity of protein shake bottle can store pills, powders, earphones and snacks. Perfect for carrying drinks to your fitness training, dance sessions, office, and competitions.
„ÄêTIPS„ÄëPlease feel free to contact us if you have any questions on the product.

name: Protein Shaker Bottle for Protein Mixes, 17 OZ, Leak Proof ‚óè Easy Clean Up ‚óè BPA Free, Tasteless, Safe Material ‚óè No Blending Ball or Whisk Needed ‚óè Blender Shaker Bottle ‚óè Gym shaker bottle (Red)
description:
Our bottles are presented in 6 beautiful different colors. A bottle can contain 17 oz / 500 ml in the main container and an additional 3 oz / 88.7 ml in each of the two small separate containers (which you can easily screw to the shaker bottle). Therefore, by purchasing this Shaker Bottle you can take with you both the fluid you intend to drink after your workout, and the amount of protein you intend to shake in it. The tightly threaded screw-on lid creates a leadproof seal.

3-in-1 Blender Bottle Pack: Designed with a standard protein shaker cup and two screw-on attachments, including a powder container and sectioned pill container, we‚Äôve made storing proteins, vitamins, and supplements even easier on the go. Efficient Mixing: Stainless steel shaker bottles for protein mixes use a spiral spring stirrer, which can mix the protein shake faster than the stirring ball, so that it will not clump while shaking it will hit the bottom so that there is no more residue on the bottom. Portable non-slip and leak-proof: Our protein mixer bottle is suitable for most car cup holders and bicycle water bottle holders. It is convenient for you to carry around. The cup body has scale marks. In addition, the design of the flip cover is absolutely leak-proof, splash-proof and non-slip, the first choice for fitness outings. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee: If you have any problem with our Sports Shaker Water Bottle or questions, please kindly contact us for direction, exchange, refund or return.

name: Protein Shaker Bottle Black 20 Oz | Pre-workout | Blending Assistant | Protein Shakes Cup | BPA-Free Plastic | Rope Handle | Dishwasher Safe | Bad Odors Free
description:
About this item

The mixing ball isn't necessary for easily absorbed proteins. For high-density or heavy proteins, using the mixing ball ensures optimal blending and a smoother consistency.
Never worry about spills or messes in your gym bag, thanks to our leak-proof design. Your belongings stay clean and dry, allowing you to focus on your workout
Enjoy consistently smooth and lump-free blends with our built-in blender ball, ensuring a perfect drink every time. Savor your beverages without any unwanted clumps.
Choose our products for a health-conscious approach to protein consumption, utilizing BPA-free materials that prioritize your well-being. Enjoy a worry-free experience.
Enjoy effortless one-handed use with our secure screw-on lid and convenient flip cap, optimizing your on-the-go experience. Stay hassle-free and perfect for those with an active lifestyle.
Streamline your cooking routine with our extra-wide mouth, allowing for effortless pouring and mess-free ingredient addition. Bid farewell to spills and save both time and effort.
Durable Plastic Build: Crafted with ultra-strong plastic, this shaker can handle your active lifestyle. It's designed to withstand rigorous workouts and daily use, providing unbeatable longevity.

Enjoy the convenience of a 20oz capacity for protein shakes while you're on the move, ensuring you stay fueled and energized throughout the day.
Alternatively, you can use it as a water bottle without the need for the mixing ball, providing versatility for various beverages and hydration on the go.

descriptionHtml:
About this item

  • Enjoy consistently smooth and lump-free blends with our built-in blender ball, ensuring a perfect drink every time. Savor your beverages without any unwanted clumps.

  • Enjoy effortless one-handed use with our secure screw-on lid and convenient flip cap, optimizing your on-the-go experience. Stay hassle-free and perfect for those with an active lifestyle.
  • Streamline your cooking routine with our extra-wide mouth, allowing for effortless pouring and mess-free ingredient addition. Bid farewell to spills and save both time and effort.
  • Durable Plastic Build: Crafted with ultra-strong plastic, this shaker can handle your active lifestyle. It's designed to withstand rigorous workouts and daily use, providing unbeatable longevity.
  • Enjoy the convenience of a 20oz capacity for protein shakes while you're on the move, ensuring you stay fueled and energized throughout the day.
  • Alternatively, you can use it as a water bottle without the need for the mixing ball, providing versatility for various beverages and hydration on the go.

name: VECH Protein Shaker Bottles with Powder Storage, 500ML Gym Sports Bottle for Protein Mixes Leak Proof Insulated Shaker Cups without Blending Ball Portable Water Bottle (Blue)
description:
About this item

„ÄêPERFECT FUNCTIONALITY„Äë The workout shaker bottle has a portable handle, and you can also hang it on your bag for easy portability. Sturdy and durable material, 100% leak proof! Don't worry about messing up your sports bag, this sports water bottle will accompany you and help you replenish nutrients in time, and enjoy the joy of sports freely!
„ÄêPRACTICAL DESIGN„ÄëThe large mouth design of this protein mixer makes it easy to pour protein powder into it, making it easier to clean; the design of the mouth to prevent choking makes it more convenient for you to drink water! Large capacity to meet the needs of life and sports, NOTE: Measurement markings go up to 18oz bottle, NOT to the brim.
„ÄêPOWERFUL USE„ÄëThe inside of this protein powder shaker bottle has a reasonable bottle body design without needing a stirring ball, you just need to close the lid and shake to mix the protein powder perfectly, and the powder will never get stuck in the bottom of the cup, good ideal for Pre-workout, Post-workout, Protein Shakes, Smoothies, and On the Go!
„ÄêSPACE SAVING„Äë Not just protein bottle shakers, this shaker bottle comes with 2 storage spaces, 30OZ protein powder storage, and medicine storage at the bottom, saving more space and meeting more of your needs! BPA free, safe and healthy, enjoy life happily!
„ÄêSINCERE SERVICE„Äë We have many years of experience in the production of shakers, and each product is strictly inspected. We will sincerely serve customers. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at any time, and we will answer you immediately .

name: VALESKA Shaker Bottle with Wire Whisk, Protein Shaker Bottle for Protein Mixes, Stainless Steel Shaker Bottle, Metal Shaker Bottle,Large Shaker Bottle 25oz (739ml), BPA Free,Leak Proof Design
description:
About this item

‚úîMetal Shaker Bottle & BPA-FREE: The large protein shaker made of food-grade 304 stainless steel, strong and durable, it is very easy to clean; 100% BPA-FREE lid make sure Safe and Healthy use.
‚úî Easy Measurements with Wire Whisk: With a big capacity of 25 oz; Scales on the Inside and outside flask wall for easy observation of the drink volume, makes mixing drinks easy; Come with a big and round stainless steel spring to help completely dissolve powder in water without caking; this metal shaker bottle will be your new favorite workout partner.
‚úî Leak-Proof & Portable: Rotary opening lid for strong sealing and no leakage; Pull-to-open suction nozzle for Easy open, Easy close; Take this easy to carry protein bottle while gyming, hiking, biking, camping or just use it in the office; Enjoy your drink anytime.
‚úî Perfect for Protein Shake and More: Multi-functional; Our water bottle shaker is more than a shaker, wide mouth allows you to add ice cubes easily, it is suitable for cold and hot beverages; it also can be used as a coffee cup, smoothie shaker, juice mixer, cocktail shaker bottle or daily water bottle, ect.

name: JIURUN 7 PCS Milkshake Protein Shaker Balls, Wire Blender Bottle Ball, 304 Stainless Steel Plastic Bottle Mixers Spring Ball, Replacement Shaker Bottle Ball for Drinking Bottle Cup
description:
About this item

üçπPackaging and Size: You will receive three 1.77 "plastic teetering balls, each weighing approximately 20 grams. 4 stainless steel mixing balls, 2.2 inches in diameter and 1.8 inches in height. It weighs approximately 13 grams.
ü•§Food Grade Material: The wire shaker balls are made of food grade 304 stainless steel, durable and rust-proof, healthy and non-toxic, and can be used together in shake bottles or cups. Colorful shaker balls are made of food-grade PP material, durable and reusable.
‚òïMulti-drinks use: Use the shaking ball to dissolve protein quickly, matcha quickly, and the stirring ball is suitable for most types of bottles. Ideal for blending protein powder, milkshakes, milk tea, healthy vegetables, whiskey, coffee juice, wine and other powdered beverage mixes.
ü•õEasy to use: Just put the stainless steel ball into the bottle, close the lid and shake well. The blending ball ensures that the nutrients are dissolved more completely and faster, you don't have to use a blender, and the operation is very simple.
üßâConvenient to clean: Just rinse with water or put in the dishwasher, convenient and simple, use the shaking ball to mix fully and effectively without clumping, you can get enough nutrients while enjoying delicious drinks.

name: BluePeak Protein Shaker Bottle 28 oz with Dual Mixing Technology, Strong Loop Top, BPA Free, Shaker Balls & Mixing Grids Included - On-The-Go Large Protein Shakers (3 Pack - Yellow, Blue, Black)
description:
DUAL MIXING TECHNOLOGY: Ball mixer & mixing grid included in each bottle so you can choose your technology of preference. The great blending effect of our dual shaker ensures that every last bit of powder is blended perfectly to easily absorb the protein.
28-OUNCE CAPACITY: BluePeak Protein Blender Bottle has plenty of volume to mix any portion size of your favorite protein drink. Each bottle has graduation marks for easy measuring. Note: measurement only goes up to 20-Ounces (600 ml).
TAKE IT WHEREVER YOU GO: Sturdy loop top for carrying and securing it anywhere. Fits in most car and gym equipment cups holder. Our portable shaker bottles for protein mixes can be your best choice in the home, office, beach camping, workout, sports, or travel. Comes in a high-quality box, printed in high resolution makes glamorous and ideal gifts for men and women!
CONVENIENT DESIGN: The wide mouth design is perfect to add mix scoops, liquids, ice-cubes and for easy cleaning. Plus, the leak-proof screw lid prevent your drinks from spilling and cover or protect your healthy drink from dust and grime.
DURABLE & SAFE: Top-rack dishwasher safe, Standard Size cup holder, Stain & Odor Resistant, and BPA FREE. No rust or metallic taste! BluePeak Shaker Bottle seals tightly so you don't have to deal with any leaks.

name: Gbuxska Glass Cocktail Shaker Set - Glass Shaker for Cocktails, Drink Shakers Cocktail and Cocktail Shakers, Glass Shaker Set for Bars, Whiskey, Cocktails (Gold, 13 oz)
description:
About this item

Mix and shake like a pro with Gbuxska's premium thick clear glass cocktail shaker set, available in gold, rose gold, and silver to match your home decor.
See the magic happen with this glass shaker - watch the colors mix together and create beautiful visual effects that tin shakers can't offer.
No more spills or leaks - our cocktail shaker kit features an extremely strong silicone seal around the rim of the lid, ensuring your drinks stay well-mixed and mess-free.
Perfect for any occasion - whether you're hosting a party or just enjoying a drink at home, our reusable design with built-in strainer is ideal for making homemade cocktails, mocktails, and martinis.
Elevate your bartending game - beginners and professionals alike can use this glass shaker to create the most complex mixed drinks with ease, making it a must-have for any home bar or cocktail enthusiast.

name: HELIMIX 2.0 Vortex Blender Shaker Bottle Holds upto 28oz | No Blending Ball or Whisk | USA Made | Portable Pre Workout Whey Protein Drink Shaker Cup | Mixes Cocktails Smoothies Shakes | Top Rack Safe
description:
About this item

üö´ NO SHAKING ACCESSORIES NEEDED - Forget the days of looking for your wire shaker ball and buying shaker ball replacements because the Helimix uses a patented vortex blender design that doesn't require anything but a few good shakes. This also means you don't have to worry about a clogged or dirty shaker balls ruining your protein shake.
üèÜ SUPERIOR SUPPLEMENT MIXING - Helimix has been rigorously tested against other mixer cups to ensure you get the best shaker bottle on the market. Our patented vortex design allows for optimal mixing of any powder supplement.
üëÉ ODOR RESISTANT MATERIAL - Helimix is made with Copolyester Plastic, which makes the cup odor resistant so you don't have to gag down your sports drinks. It's also 100% BPA/BPS-free plastic to ensure supplements stay clean.
üßº DURABLE & EASY TO CLEAN - Helimix uses shatter-proof Copolyester plastic. And once your workout is done, throw the Helimix in your dishwasher for a quick and easy clean. Most other shaker bottles are made of cheap plastic and are breakable.
ü§ù LEAK PROOF GUARANTEE - If it leaks please contact us and we'll make sure you're issues are resolved. We pride ourselves in our quality products and customer service. Also, the patented design of Helimix includes a sturdy loop for easy transport to and from the gym. The Helimix is just the right size that fits in nearly all cup holders.

  • üßº DURABLE & EASY TO CLEAN - Helimix uses shatter-proof Copolyester plastic. And once your workout is done, throw the Helimix in your dishwasher for a quick and easy clean. Most other shaker bottles are made of cheap plastic and are breakable.
  • ü§ù LEAK PROOF GUARANTEE - If it leaks please contact us and we'll make sure you're issues are resolved. We pride ourselves in our quality products and customer service. description:
About this item

üëâùêíùê°ùêöùê§ùêûùê´ ùêÅùê®ùê≠ùê≠ùê•ùêû ùê∞ùê¢ùê≠ùê° ùêèùê´ùê®ùê≠ùêûùê¢ùêß ùêèùê®ùê∞ùêùùêûùê´ ùêíùê≠ùê®ùê´ùêöùê†ùêû ùêÇùê®ùê¶ùê©ùêöùê´ùê≠ùê¶ùêûùêßùê≠ÔºöWant to easily supplement your protein intake anytime, anywhere? This shaker bottle is your best choice! Not only is it convenient to carry, but it also comes with a protein powder storage compartment, allowing you to add protein powder to your drink anytime, anywhere, and meet your nutritional needs.
üëâùêíùê°ùêöùê§ùêûùê´ ùêÅùê®ùê≠ùê≠ùê•ùêû ùêÇùê®ùê¶ùêû ùêñùê¢ùê≠ùê° ùêö ùêèùê¢ùê•ùê•/ùêÇùêöùê•ùêúùê¢ùêÆùê¶ ùêÇùê®ùê¶ùê©ùêöùê´ùê≠ùê¶ùêûùêßùê≠: Want to be able to take your medication or calcium supplements on-the-go? This shaker bottle is the perfect choice for you! Not only is it convenient to carry, but it also features a pill/calcium compartment, allowing you to easily access your medication or supplements anytime, anywhere.
üëâùêåùêöùêùùêû ùê∞ùê¢ùê≠ùê° ùêìùê´ùê¢ùê≠ùêöùêß-ùêÅùêèùêÄ ùêÖùê´ùêûùêûÔºöThe TRITAN material is BPA-free, which means it won't release harmful chemicals to contaminate your food and beverages. It's also easy to clean and can be washed in the dishwasher for convenience and efficiency. Not only is it safe and reliable, but it also features a strong seal that prevents leaks and is highly resistant to impact, making it sturdy and durable. It's the best choice for your everyday use.
üëâùüîùüêùüéùêåùêã/ùüêùüèùê®ùê≥ ùêìùê°ùêû ùêÉùê®ùêÆùêõùê•ùêû ùêíùêúùêöùê•ùêû ùêåùêöùê´ùê§ùê¢ùêßùê†: Our water bottle has a capacity of 620 ML/21oz, which is large enough to hold plenty of water and other beverages, so you don't have to constantly refill it while you're on the go. Additionally, our water bottle features convenient measurement markings, allowing you to easily control your water intake and ensure that your body is properly hydrated every day.
üëâùêáùê¢ùê†ùê°-ùê™ùêÆùêöùê•ùê¢ùê≠ùê≤ ùêñùê¢ùê´ùêû ùêñùê°ùê¢ùê¨ùê§ ùêÅùêöùê•ùê•ùê¨: Our protein shaker bottle comes equipped with a high-quality Wire Whisk Balls. When you add it to the shaker bottle, it quickly and evenly blends protein powder and other ingredients, preventing clumps or particles, and ensuring that your drink is smooth and delicious

name: BlenderBottle Classic V2 Shaker Bottle Perfect for Protein Shakes and Pre Workout, 28-Ounce, Clear/Black
description:
About this item

28-ounce capacity (Note: measurement markings only go to 22 ounces)
Patented mixing system uses 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall wire whisk found only in BlenderBottle brand shaker cups
Wide mouth makes it easy to add mix scoops and liquids, and embossed markings measure both ounces and milliliters; rounded base for thorough mixing
Screw-on lid creates leak-proof seal, and secure flip cap with SpoutGuard keeps germs at bay; wide loop top for easy carrying or attaching keys
Dishwasher safe, BPA and phthalate-free

name: LEMONKIND BPA Free Tritan Eco-friendly Shaker Bottle, Clear/White - 400ml
description:
From the brand

Superfood for a Healthier You

LEMONKIND celebrates your efforts and practice with positivity. We are made by real people for real people.

Previous page

Plant-based, Nutrient-Packed & Effective

Discover our range of functional ready-to-drink and ready-to-mix products, expertly crafted to kickstart your body and support your wellness journey.

How did we get our start?

When I was a little girl, we would frequently visit my grandparents' farm and have a scavenger hunt for fresh fruits and vegetables. My love of nature inspired me to create LEMONKIND in 2016 - with a mission to make 100% natural beverages that are not only delicious but also good-for you.

What makes our products unique?

We provide healthy, clean nourishment that is always preservative free, gluten free, allergen friendly & vegan.

What problem are we solving?

Your journey is personal, so we are here to support, inform and motivate while you do something wonderful for you.

Next page
descriptionHtml:
From the brand

    When I was a little girl, we would frequently visit my grandparents' farm and have a scavenger hunt for fresh fruits and vegetables. My love of nature inspired me to create LEMONKIND in 2016 - with a mission to make 100% natural beverages that are not only delicious but also good-for you.

    What makes our products unique?

    We provide healthy, clean nourishment that is always preservative free, gluten free, allergen friendly & vegan.

    What problem are we solving?

    Your journey is personal, so we are here to support, inform and motivate while you do something wonderful for you.

Next page

name: Takeya Stainless Steel Insulated Shaker Tumbler with Spout Lid, 24 Ounce, Cobalt
description:
About this item

Leakproof Spout Lid: The secure leakproof spout lid gives you airtight security when shaking your bottle. The twist off cap keeps the drinking area clean and sanitary. The comfort loop handle lets you carry your bottle to the gym with ease.
Sweatproof: The sweatproof, textured coating gives you a good grip for easy one-handed drinking while working out and keeps your smoothies or meal supplements ice cold up to 24 hours
Included Agitator: The patented nylon agitator with unique 3-prong design is optimized for better mixing
Slim Tumbler Design: the tumbler fits in treadmill cupholders or in the car to take on the go
Innovative Hydration Solutions: Takeya brings over 55 years of Japanese design heritage to our line of insulated, BPA free water bottles, our sustainable iced tea, fruit infusion, and cold brew pitchers, and our Pickleball bottles and equipment.

name: Utopia Home 2-Pack Shaker Bottle - 24 Ounce Protein Shaker Plastic Bottle for Pre & Post workout with Twist and Lock Protein Box Storage(All Black & Clear/Black)
description:
About this item

SHAKER BOTTLE PACK OF 2 - Includes 2 units of 24-ounce / 700 ml capacity shaker bottle, a detachable protein storage jar, and a plastic whisk mixer ball. The ideal sports bottle for instant protein shakes and supplement drinks.
PROTEIN BOX - The protein mixer bottles come with a twist-and-lock protein box/storage compartment with a 200cc capacity provides for easy storage of protein powder, supplements and more.
EASY TO CARRY - With Strong & firm handle, you can carry the protein blender bottle along wherever you want to; ideal for pre, post and during workouts.
INTERLOCKING FACILITY - The protein storage jars at the bottom come with an interlocking feature, allowing you to use the protein shaker bottle with or without the storage box.
NOT DISHWASHER SAFE -Clean with hands using a light detergent and water

name: G Fuel Beem Team Shaker Bottle, Drink Mixer for Pre Workout, Protein Shake, Smoothie Mix, Meal Replacement Shakes, Energy Powder and More, Blender Cup, Portable Safe, BPA Free Plastic - 16 oz
description:
About this item

BEEM TEAM SHAKER CUP: Whether you‚Äôre getting intentionally lost at sea, having YouTubers control your life for an entire day or turning your bedroom into a gigantic cereal bowl, you need to stay energized - just take it from iconic content creator Matthew Beem, who‚Äôs partnered with G Fuel for the Beem Team Shaker Bottle. The pink and-yellow drink shaker features a spray paint-inspired splatter design to help inspire your next epic project or gaming session.
MIXES WELL: No need to worry about the hassle of cleaning and looking after a shaker ball anymore. The top of our blender cup is designed to do all the work. Simply use the cup to mix your favorite G Fuel energy powder with water, give it a few good shakes, and voila! You have a delicious energy drink that'll help you combat anything.
LEAK-PROOF DESIGN: Say goodbye to messy spills! Our blender bottle features a secure locking lid that ensures a leak-proof seal during vigorous shaking or while on-the-go.
VERSATILE USE: G Fuel's blender bottle shaker can be used to create any beverage of your choosing! The mixing glass holds up to 16 oz of liquid, and can be used to effortlessly blend G Fuel energy powders, or to create smoothies, cocktails, pre workout or post workout protein shakes and more!
SAFE, BPA FREE PLASTIC: Made from high-quality, BPA-free plastic, G Fuel Shaker Bottles are safe and built to withstand daily use.

You have a delicious energy drink that'll help you combat anything.,LEAK-PROOF DESIGN: Say goodbye to messy spills! Our blender bottle features a secure locking lid that ensures a leak-proof seal during vigorous shaking or while on-the-go.,VERSATILE USE: G Fuel's blender bottle shaker can be used to create any beverage of your choosing! The mixing glass holds up to 16 oz of liquid, and can be used to effortlessly blend G Fuel energy powders, or to create smoothies, cocktails, pre workout or post workout protein shakes and more!,SAFE, BPA FREE PLASTIC: Made from high-quality, BPA-free plastic, G Fuel Shaker Bottles are safe and built to withstand daily use.

Finally, the extra-last UV ink is designed to protect from fading and chipping. 28 oz. capacity. 100% Leak-Free. BPA-free, food grade plastic. Lightweight and portable with extra wide mouth. Dishwasher safe.

name: Makran Shaker Bottle (2 Packs) 20 oz - Shaker Bottle for Pre & Post Workout Drinks - Protein Mixer Shaker Bottel with Metal Ball for Gym - Black & Clear White - BPA Free Gym Shaker Bottles
description: The 2-pack of Makran Bottles Classic 600ml Shaker Bottles makes it easy for the consumer to maintain proper nutrition and hydration. While one dishwasher-safe bottle is getting clean, there‚Äôs another available on write time for mixing protein shakes, smoothies, fiber drinks, and meal replacements. Featuring a patented mixing system, stainless steel Mixing Whisk Ball (found only in Makran brand shaker Bottles) moves freely inside the bottle to smooth out drink mixes and meal ingredients. It‚Äôs also a handy kitchen tool for mixing pancake batter, scrambled eggs, and salad dressings. The wide mouth makes it easy to add scoops of powdered mixes, meal ingredients, and liquids, and embossed markings show both ounces and milliliters for easy measuring anywhere (note that markings on the 600 ml capacity shaker bottle only go up to 20 0z). Bottle contents and liquids are securely contained that creates a leakproof seal, and a flip cap that snaps securely shut for shaking and transportation. The convenient loop top makes it easy to carry the bottle and offers a place to attach any type of keys during gym time. The Makran Shaker Bottle 600ml can also be used as a water bottle and the whisk ball can be left inside, as it will never rust, chip, or peel.it Includes ( pack of 2), 600 ml Makran Shaker Bottles. BPA and phthalate-free, dishwasher safe.

name: Blender Bottle x Forza Sports Classic 28 oz. Shaker - Dill With It
description:
Whether you're weight training for sports, competing for the gold at the Olympics, or simply aiming to lose weight and stay fit, Blender Bottle's premium and innovative products help you maintain proper nutrition and hydration every step of the way. With the Blender Bottle x Forza Sports Classic 28 oz. Shaker with Loop Top, you can mix up the toughest protein and meal replacement powders. Add a banana or mix in a little ice cream. Whatever you are craving, BlenderBottle has you covered. The patented mixing system uses the BlenderBall wire whiskFeatures a "StayOpen" flip cap and the classic screw-on lid.

Forza Sports exclusive BlenderBottle brand shakers
This shaker bottle is 100% leakproof
The adjustable carry loop lets you hold more when your hands are full and provides a convenient place to attach your keys while at the gym
Made from the highest quality materials
This shaker is BPA and Phthalate free
Easy to clean and dishwasher safe
Embossed ounce and milliliter markings helps you keep track of your intake

Get the most popular shaker bottle on the market! Holds 28 ounces not including the BlenderBall and powders/supplements. Why the Whisk Ball? Unlike stationary mesh grates or other in-lid elements, the BlenderBall whips around inside the bottle as you shake. The BlenderBall is springy and bounces off both the top and the bottom of the bottle, working against the liquids. Add ingredients like peanut butter, applesauce or yogurt to your protein or meal-replacement shakes for added flavor - the BlenderBall whips them in with ease. The BlenderBall will never rust, chip or peel. Every BlenderBall is manufactured using a unique multistage process designed to ensure safety, quality, and longevity.

The patented mixing system uses the BlenderBall wire whisk

Easy to clean and dishwasher safe, Features a "StayOpen" flip cap and the classic screw-on lid

Embossed ounce and milliliter markings helps you keep track of your intake

Holds 28 ounces not including the BlenderBall and powders/supplements

name: Iron Infidel Battle Bottle - Half Gallon Water Bottle Insulated, 64 oz Stainless Steel Water Jug with Handle- Gym Water Bottle for Men with Rugged Sleeve for Storage (OCP Camo 2 Liter)
description:
The Original Battle Bottle

Prior to release, our bottles were put to the test by members of the world's most elite law enforcement and military units.

After many hours of testing and several revisions, we finally landed on a design that will withstand nearly anything you can put it through.

Previous page

Join, or Die Edition

Unmatched Versatility

Keep your personal items secure and off the gym floor with the Battle Bottle sleeve.

Overland Edition

Stay Hydrated on the Trail

The premium quality and double wall insulation will keep your liquid cold in any climate.

Betsy Edition

Built to Last

Get rid of the cooler and countless plastic water bottles. This is the job-site solution.

Next page

1 GYM 2 OUTDOORS 3 JOBSITE

Over 60 Thousand Battle Bottles Sold Worldwide and Countless Testimonials.

Interchangeable Sleeves and Battle Packs

Battle Packs

A wide-mouth cap & straw cap (straw included)
PVC patch and two-toned paracord handle
Bottle cleaning brush

Grab a Pack

Join, or Die - Tan

Custom hand-drawn artwork from premier artists.

Join, or Die

Black Betsy

Showcase your inner patriot with our Black Betsy sleeve.

Black Betsy

Sleep Deprived Edition

In honor of the night watchmen.

Get Yours

Live Free Edition

Viking Warrior Spirit.

Live Free

Earned, Not Given Edition

The Earned, Not Given Battle Bottle design is the first of its kind.

Earn It Now

Next page

Our heavy-duty nylon sleeves fit a variety of 64 oz steel bottles on the market.

It will fit many popular brand steel bottles that range between 4.5" - 4.75" in diameter (width) and between 8.5" - 9.0" in height. Measure the height from the base of the bottle to the base of the spout.

Is the Battle Bottle BPA free?

All Battle Bottles are BPA-free, including the caps and accessories. Enjoy BPA-free peace of mind.

How long will the Battle Bottle keep liquid cold?

It will maintain cold temps for at least 24 hours. We have countless testimonials from customers who are having ice maintained for over 72 hours, but ultimately it depends on the storage conditions. We don't inflate performance like many competitors.

What material is the sleeve made out of?

Heavy-duty, tear-resistant nylon. We use the same nylon that is used in police/military vests and plate carriers. Why not neoprene? Because neoprene is cheap, wears out easily, and provides no additional insulation to a vacuum sealed water bottle!

Do Battle Bottles include both the steel bottle and nylon sleeve?

Yes, all Battle Bottles include both. We also sell sleeves separately, which fit most steel bottles between 4.5" - 4.75" in diameter (width) and between 8.5" - 9.0" in height. Measure the height from the base of the bottle to the base of the spout.

Check out our other product lines in the Iron Infidel Store

Previous page

Elite Tier Quality Resistance Bands

300% More Durable Than The Competition - When you're shopping for resistance bands, it's important to know how they are manufactured. We are likely the only company who sells LAYERED resistance bands.

Shop Bands

Handles & Anchors for Resistance Bands

Add a door anchor and handles to get the most out of your resistance bands.

Upgrade Now

Heavy Duty Wrist Wraps

Extra heavy duty wrist support, perfect for all forms of resistance training, including: bodybuilding, Olympic lifting, powerlifting, crossfit, strength training, and other forms of athletics .

Wrist Wraps

Weightlifting Wrist Straps

These are competition level lifting straps, but perfect for the gym rat who wants a quality pair of straps. We focus on quality and durability.

Wrist Straps

Next page

name: MXCN protein, smoothie shaker blender bottle 17OZ | No blending ball | Leak proof | Patented Cone shaped Vortex Mixing | Easy clean | Bpa free | Portable with perfect grip (Orange)
description: Material: Body, Lid, Cap : PP / Grip: TPR / Gasket : Silicon Key Features: When customers buy protein shaker bottles, what are the important factors that they consider important? There might be various factors, but we think that people will consider these two factors most important. 1. Is it easy to wash? 2. Does it can shake ingredient efficiently with no lump left? About these questions, we can assure that our MXCN protein, smoothie shaker is an answer. Unlike most protein shaker bottles, our product has patented cone shaped structure so that it does not need mixing ball or whisk inside. Therefore, you don't need to wash them, you only have to wash bottle. This is saving lots of time, making you focus on the essence of workout with our own solution. Also, its cone shaped structure makes ingredients mix so efficiently with creating vortex. No lump left! Country of origin: China / Invented: South Korea Brand: MXCN

features: PATENTED CONE SHAPED STRUCTURE: MXCN protein, smoothie shaker bottle has patented Cone shaped inner structure which creates vortex. This makes it able to mix ingredients by continually circulating your ingredients around the cone shaped inner structure without getting stuck in corners. This is so efficient that you don't need to worry about any powder lump left inside. It mixes powder so well! Just shake it for 20~30 seconds!,SIMPLE TO USE & LEAK PROOF: Unlike other protein shakers, this product does not use a mixing ball or whisk to mix your ingredients because it has patented Cone shaped inner structure. Therefore, it is very easy to use. You only need to put powder or ingredients inside the bottle with water, and just shake it. You don't need to put mixing ball inside. This is so convenient to use. Also, this product has silicon ling that prevents liquid inside from leaking. It won't drip on your hands or cloth.,EASY TO CLEAN : Since this product does not use a mixing ball or whisk, you don't need to put effort to clean those complicated parts. Those parts are actually hard to clean. However, this product has nothing inside the bottle, so what you only need to clean is just a bottle. Also, this product has 3.26 inch wide diameter, and top and bottom part of bottle has same diameter size. This will make you easy to clean it. For this, you just put clean water inside, shake and empty it, and its done.,VARIOUS USAGE : You can use this product not only for mixing protein powder, but also for making smoothie. This bottle can crush the soft fruits into smoothie such as banana, kiwi, strawberry. You don't need to make smoothie with blender. What you just need is put the fruit inside and shake it!,EASY TO CARRY : Unlike other protein shaker bottle that has to grab it's body to carry and cannot fully grab in one hand, this product has perfect convenient grip so that you can carry it very easily. You don't need to grab body part of bottle, instead you can grab grip on the top part of product. You can fully grab the grip because it is not thick. Also, this product has 0.32LB weight, which is perfect light weight for bringing the bottle in your bag.

name: Battle Shakers Bomb Shaker Cup | 20 Oz Leak-Proof Shaker Bottle | Protein Cup with Storage Compartment | Dishwasher Safe Protein Shaker | BPA Free Sports Bottle | Desert Sand
description:
Battle Shaker Bomb will have your competition fleeing for cover. In fact, it looks so real you may be accused of possessing a weapon of mass destruction! With its patented design and full functionality, Battle Shaker Bomb is constructed of the highest quality plastic resins to endure even the most treacherous battlefields.

Features: Patented Ultra-durable Design, Constructed of Thick Gauge Plastic Resins, Double Leak-proof, Dishwasher Safe, BPA and DEHP Free, Handy Storage compartment

Battle Shakers are designed to mix all powdered supplements quickly and thoroughly. Our patented dome design and spout plug make Battle Shakers 100% double leak-proof and are dishwasher-safe. There is a compartment in the base where you can store your favorite powdered supplement, valuables or even your car key fob. Battle Shakers are free from toxic chemicals such as Bisphenol A (BPA) and DEHP.*

Whether your battlefield is the gym, cross-fit box, obstacle course, track, or wherever your body is pushed to its limits, Battle Shakers are your indispensable weapon to help you win the battle to be your best.

description: Our 20 oz shaker bottle features a unique whisk ball that effortlessly breaks down protein powders, eliminating any lumps or clumps. With just a few shakes, you'll achieve a smooth and velvety texture that enhances the flavor and consistency of your favorite protein beverages. Bottle's ergonomic design provides a comfortable grip, making it easy to handle during intense workouts. The wide mouth opening enables effortless filling and cleaning, saving you time and hassle. The convenient measurement markings on the side allow for precise portion control and easy tracking of your protein intake.

description:
When you want to make protein drinks anytime, anywhere and look cool, Genteen's shaker bottle is a powerful tool that can help you do that. This ‚Äãmixer cup will hold a variety of different substances that you want to mix together.

Ergonomic, Quiet, Lightweight and Highly Effective!

Flip-Top sports cup Lid with superb sealing properties

Sports lid with convenient carrying loop, as well as a flip-top lid and ergonomic mounthpiece that feels good.

Crafted To Last

Made from Tritan, the same material used to make baby bottles, so it's safe and very sturdy for many years to use.

Smooth Tasty All The Time

Be confident and choose our shaker bottle which intended for powdered nutrition/liquid ingredients.

Shaker bottle wouldn't turn on?

Received an old version shaker bottle?

We have upgraded the product, now it is the second generation of shaker bottle, if you receive the first generation, please connected with us.

Is there a risk of melting the charging port?

The silicone port is not closed properly, the charging port is wet, or the plug is wet, or a mismatched charging cable is used, all of which can cause short circuits, heat, and melting.

How do I charge my shaker bottle?

Remove the rubber tab on the motor unit to show the charging input. Plug in USB-C (supplied). The charging LED will glow red. Once fully charged - 120 mins - the LED will glow white.

How do I clean my Mixer? / Can I use a dishwasher to clean it?

HAND CLEAN ONLY. NOT dishwasher safe. Pours a neutral detergent into our shake cup or just water into it and click the motor buttom to clean itself. Allow the shaker to create a vortex and rinse it! Do not get the charging hole wet.

features: „ÄêEfficient Mixing, Say Goodbye to "Lumps"„ÄëOur electric shaker bottle mix the protein powder evenly with strong motor power which spins at 7000rpm, ensuring smooth mixing with no lumpiness.The super mixing function does not need to worry about lumps that no longer dissolve in these drinks.,„ÄêPowerful Battery„ÄëIn order to achieve more powerful mixing, our motors are a more efficient motors. The powerful motor ensures that there are no remaining blocks (the performance may be slightly reduced when the battery is low). After the Genteen laboratory experiment, it can last for 60 mins after being fully charged. Note: You need to long press 2 seconds to turn on the electric shaker bottle.,„ÄêEasy to Clean„ÄëPours a neutral detergent into our blender bottles or just water into it and click the motor buttom to clean itself. Allow the shaker to create a vortex and rinse it! What's more, we have prepared a brush for you so that you can clean it thoroughly to extend the life of the bottle. Note: Do not put it into the dishwasher!,„ÄêGreat Gift for Fitness Enthusiasts„ÄëIt will be evenly mixed with no more chunk of powder floating around as compare to traditional hand shaker bottle. Genteen electric shaker bottle is the first choice gadgets gift for fitness enthusiasts on Birthdays, Christmas, Thanksgiving and more.,„ÄêSatisfaction Guaranteed„ÄëGenteen has always been committed to becoming the most trusted household product brand by customers. If you have any questions about the shaker bottle, please feel free to contact us. After purchasing our products, you can enjoy Lifetime warranty and 365 days return service.

name: JoyJolt Triple Insulated Cocktail/Protein Shaker Bottle. 20oz Shaker Cup with Alcohol Measure Lid and Jigger Cap. 12hr Ice Cold Shaker Bottles for Protein Mixes, Shake or Smoothie Cups, Metal Mixer
description:
About this item

COLDER COCKTAILS AND SHAKES: With a JoyJolt Triple Insulated Cobbler Shaker, drinks stay cold for longer - 12 hours in fact! Our vacuum insulation is already brag worthy for its 12 hour abilities, but we also infused it with copper so you get the coldest drink even when it‚Äôs been in your hot hands or locker.
WITH TWO MEASURING LIDS! This drink mixer can be used for anything! With a 7oz Measuring Lid and 1oz Jigger Cap it‚Äôs the perfect margarita or martini shaker or shot shaker. But with its screw lid it‚Äôs also a great espresso shaker, iced coffee shaker, or even a salad dressing shaker if you so desire!
FITS YOUR CUP HOLDER, TOO! This 20 ounce ice shaker is 2.6‚Äù wide at the base and 3.5‚Äù at the top. Of course, you won‚Äôt be taking your liquor shaker on the road with booze in, but it‚Äôs handy for your pre workout cup shaker instead of in your bag. Or, smoothie cup, shakes and iced coffee!
UNIQUELY SPILL PROOF! A standard bar shaker has a press lid, but this stainless steel shaker bottle for drinks has both a screw-top lid and screw-top cap. It won‚Äôt fly off during an epic flair, and it also means you CAN stash your cocktail / protein powder shaker bottle in your bag without spills.
CORROSION RESISTANT AND BPA FREE: Your metal shaker bottle is naturally free from lead, BPA and Phthalates. And the 18/8 stainless steel construction has been infused with chromium and nickel ‚Äì both food safe metals that stop our shakers going rusty! Handwash only to protect vacuum seal.
THE SHAKER OF THE YEAR! This powder coated bar shaker comes in many matte hues incl. black, white and the on-trend Veri Peri Purple - Pantone Color of The Year! Each alcohol shaker comes safely nestled in a gift box with a 12 Month Guarantee for some satisfying unboxing. Grab yours now, from JoyJolt.
